GSP33brsgor3u:17: yasmāt karmaṇā gatyāgatirūpo 'narthastasmāt karmaphale jugupsāṃ ghṛṇāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:18: viraktiṃ kurvīteti pañcāgnividyopasaṃhāre śravaṇādvairāgyārthaṃ pradarśyate ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:19: śāstrādisūtre nityānityavivekakṛtaṃ vairāgyamuktam, iha taddārḍhyāya gatyāgatikleśabhāvanākṛtaṃ taducyata ityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:30: atra pūrvapakṣe nirāśrayaprāṇagatyabhāvāt, na vairāgyaṃ, siddhānte bhūtāśrayaprāṇagatervairāgyamiti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:32: āpaḥ pañcasvagniṣu hutāḥ pañcamyāmāhutau hutāyāṃ yathā puruṣaśabdavācyāḥ puruṣātmanā pariṇamante tathā kiṃ tvaṃ vettheti śvetaketuṃ prati rājñaḥ pravāhaṇasya praśnaḥ, tasya cottarājñāne tatpitaraṃ prati rājovāca 'asau
GSP33brsgor3u:33: vāva loke gautamāgnistatra śraddhākhyā āpaḥ āhutiḥ parjanyāgnau somarūpā iha khlvagnihotre śraddhayā hutā dadhyādirūpā āpo yajamānasaṃlagnāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prapya somākhyadivyadehātmanā sthitāḥ karmānte drutāḥ parjanye hūyante tato vṛṣṭirūpāḥ pṛthivyā annarūpāḥ puruṣe retorūpāḥ yoṣiti hutāḥ āpaḥ puruṣaśabdavācyāḥ pumātmakā bhavanti'iti nirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brsgor3u:35: yathā tṛṇajalāyukā tṛṇāntaraṃ gṛhītvā pūrvatṛṇaṃ tyajati tathā jīvo dehāntaraṃ gṛhītvā pūrvadehaṃ tyajatīti śrutivirodhāditi śaṅkate-nanvanyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:36: ihaiva karmāyattabhāvidehaṃ devo 'hamityādibhāvanayā gṛhītvā pūrvadehaṃ tyajatīti śrutyarthaḥ, ato na virodha iti samādhatte-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:38: ghaṭākāśavadupahito jīvaḥ sūkṣmopādhigatyā lokāntaraṃ gacchatīti pañcāgniśrutyuktaḥ prakārastadvirodhādanyāḥ kalpanāḥ sarvā anādartavyā ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:43: dehāntaraṃ prati manomātraṃ gacchati, indriyāṇi tu nūtanānyevārabhyante /
GSP33brsgor3u:52: dehasya kevalābjatve vātaṃ pittaṃ ca vāyavyaṃ taijasaṃ na syātāmiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:67: prāṇānāmagnyādiṣu layasya mukhyatve jīvasya gatibhogayorayogātsarve prāṇā anūtkrāmantīti vispaṣṭaśruterlomādigauṇalayapāṭhācca
GSP33brsgor3u:70: prathame 'śravaṇād iti cen na tā eva hy upapatteḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:73: nanu prathamapadaṃ vyarthamuttarāgniṣvapyapāmaśravaṇādityāśaṅkya somavṛṣṭyannaretasāmabrūpatvāduttaratra tāsāṃ śravaṇamasti, na prathama ityāha-yadināmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:74: pañcāgniṣvapāmāhutitve siddhe tāsāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ bhavenna tatsiddhaṃ prathamāgnau tāsāmanāhutitvāditi śaṅkārthaḥ evaṃ hi śraddhāśabdenāpāṃ grahe sati praśnottaropasaṃhārāṇāṃ saṃgānādekārthatvādekavākyatopapadyate, agrahe tu caturṣvagniṣvevāpāmāhutitvāccaturthyāmāhutāviti vācyaṃ, ataḥ praśnopasaṃhārayoḥ pañcamyāmiti śravaṇāt, prathamāgnāvapyāpa eva grāhyā
GSP33brsgor3u:80: tasyāḥ śraddhāhuteḥ somaḥ saṃbhavatītyādinā śraddhāsomādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapariṇāmatvaṃ śrutaṃ tato dravapariṇāmatvāt śraddhāyā aptvaṃ pratyayātmakamukhyaśraddhāyā āhutitvāyogāccetyarthaḥ śraddhāśabdasyāpsu sūkṣmatvaguṇena vṛttimuktvā lakṣaṇāṃ vaktuṃ śraddhāyā adbhirekakarmayogitvaṃ hetutvaṃ vā saṃbandhamāha-śraddhāpūrvaketi /
GSP33brsgor3u:86: apāṃ gatimupetyādbhiḥ saha jīvānāṃ gatimākṣipya samādhatte-athāpītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:87: dyulokāgnau śraddhāhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavatītyuktvā vākyaśeṣe dhūmādimārgeṇa ākāśāccandramasaṃ prāptā iṣṭyādikāriṇa eṣa somo
GSP33brsgor3u:89: śraddhāśabditādbhiḥ saha gatiriha śraddhāhutivākye pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:90: teṣāṃ sūkṣmābhirdravyāpūrvarūpābhiḥ pañcīkṛtābhiradbhiḥ saṃbandhaṃ vadan sahagatiṃ vivṛṇoti-teṣāṃ cāgnihotreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:91: nidhanaṃ maraṇaṃ tannimittakamantyeṣṭividhānaṃ, asau yajamānaḥ, svargāya gacchatviti mantrārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:94: sāyaṃprātarāhutyostvamutkrāntiṃ na gatiṃ na pratiṣṭhāṃ na tṛptiṃ na punarāvṛttiṃ na lokaṃ pratyutthāyinaṃ vettha'iti ṣaṭ praśnāḥ kṛtāsteṣāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:95: nirvacanamapi rājñaiva 'te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ te 'ntarikṣadvārā
GSP33brsgor3u:96: divaṃ gacchataste divamevāhavanīyaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ kurvāte divaṃ tarpayataste tataḥ punarāvartete tataḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣe yoṣiti ca hute
GSP33brsgor3u:104: yathā yajñe camasasthaṃ somamṛtvija āpyāyasveti kriyāvṛttau loṭ punaḥ punarāpyāyya punaḥ punarapakṣayya bhakṣayanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:109: yathā paśurbhogya evamajñaḥ sa bhedadhīmān devānāṃ bhogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:110: ātmaśabdasya mukhyatvabalena sūtrāṃśaṃ vyākhyāya prakṛtapañcāgnayaḥ sūtrakṛtātmatvenopacaritā iti vyākhyāntaramāha-anātmetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:111: vidyāstutyarthamannatvaṃ na mukhyamityatra śrutyantarārthaṃ sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathāhīti
GSP33brsgor3u:118: yathetamityārabhya śvādiyonimityantaṃ vākyaṃ yāvattāvadāmnāyata iti yojanā
GSP33brsgor3u:119: atra yāvatsaṃpātamiti viśeṣaṇādramaṇīyacaraṇā iti vākyācca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:122: teṣāmiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yadā tatkarma paryavaiti viparikṣīṇaṃ bhavati tadā punarāvartanta iti śrutyantareṇāpi kṛtsrakarmaṇaścandraloke bhuktatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:124: ayaṃ naro yatkiñcidiha loke karma karoti tasyāntaṃ phalaṃ paraloke prāpya karmārthaṃ punarāyātīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:130: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye ye kecidiha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ puṇyayonibhāja iti yat tat abhyāśo ha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:133: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karma bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena'ityādiśāstreṇa
GSP33brsgor3u:135: tataśca janmārabya dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ karmahetukaḥ bhogatvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:138: smṛtavāśramāḥ āśramiṇaḥ pretya mṛtvā lokāntare karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā tataḥ śeṣeṇa bhuktādanyena karmaṇā anuśayākhyena punarjanma pratipadyante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:139: viśiṣṭā deśādayo medhāntā daśa guṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:142: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svarge bhoge sati bhuktasya karmaṇo leśo 'nuśayastadvānavarohati bhāṇḍe snehaleśasya dṛṣṭatvāt, tataḥ śeṣeṇeti smṛteścetyekadeśivyākhyāmāha-kecidityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:144: nanu bhoganāśyatvāt karmaṇo leśo na yuktaḥ iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:145: kṛtsnakarmaṇo bhoge jāte nāśaḥ syāt, natu bhogo jāta iti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:155: kṣapayitvā punarāgacchantīti prāpyantamiti vākyena gamyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:157: yatkiñceti yāvatsaṃpātamiti ca sāmānyaśabdayorāmuṣmikaviṣayatvena saṅkoco nyāyya iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:163: ārabdhavadanārabdhasyāpi balavataḥ pratibandhakatvānna sarvakarmaṇaḥ phaladānāyābhivyaktiriti samādhatte-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:166: astu tarhi durbalasya karmaṇo nāśa ityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:167: nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmetyekānta utsargaḥ sa ca prāyaścitabrahmajñānadhyānairbādhyate na maraṇamātraṇetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:177: kiñca vyañjakatve 'pi maraṇasya kiṃ sarvakarmavyañjakatvaṃ kalpyate uta yatkiñcitkarmavyañjakatvam
GSP33brsgor3u:180: rūpāṇāṃ pradīpavat, maraṇaṃ na kasyacidapi karmaṇo vayañjakaṃ kintu
GSP33brsgor3u:185: evaṃ sarvakarmasaṅgha ekajanmārambhaka ityaikabhavikaḥ karmāśaya iti
GSP33brsgor3u:191: avarohamārga itthaṃ śrūyate-'tasmin yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante yathetamākāśamākaśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo
GSP33brsgor3u:192: bhūtvābhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhavati bhūtvā pravarṣati ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante ato vai khalu durniṣprapataraṃ yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyante'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:193: dhūmādyadhvanā yathetaṃ yathāgataṃ tathetamadhvānaṃ punarāyantītyuktvā dhūmādirūpapitṛmārgastharātryādikaṃ noktamadhikaṃ cābhrādikamuktamiti matvā sūtrakṛtoktaṃ yathetamanevaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:201: anugrahaśca jñānaṃ ca śīlametadvidurbudhāḥ'iti smṛtāvuktāvadrohādayaḥ śāstrārthajñānarūpaṃ śīlaṃ sarvakarmāṅgamuktaṃ tadbodhakaṃ caraṇapadamaṅginaḥ śrautādikarmaṇo lakṣakaṃ, karmaṇa evottarāvasthā dharmādharmākhyāpūrvamiti karmalakṣaṇayaiva tadabhinnāpūrvākhyānuśayasiddhiriti kārṣṇājinimatam //9//
GSP33brsgor3u:206: caraṇaśabdavācyasyaiva grahaṇasaṃbhavānna lakṣaṇā yukteti śaṅkitvaiva brūte-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:210: vedāstadarthakarmāṇyācāraṃ vinā na phalantīti smṛtyā śīlasya karmāṅgatvānna pṛthakphalāpekṣā, aṅgiphalenārthavattvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:212: aṅgasya phalāsaṃbhavena mukhyārthasyācārasya grahaṇāyogāllakṣaṇā yukteti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:213: yadyācārasya snānādivat puruṣasaṃskāratayā puruṣārthatvaṃ tadāpyavirodha ityāha-puruṣārthatve 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:215: astu tarhi śīlakhyācārādeva yonyāpattirityāśaṅkya 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā'ityādi śrutyā virodhānnaivamityāha-karma ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:220: yadyapyakrodhādirūpaṃ śīlaṃ sādhāraṇadharmātmakaṃ viśeṣarūpāt karmaṇo 'bhinnaṃ tathāpi caraṇācāraśabdau karmavācināveva na śīlavācakāviti na
GSP33brsgor3u:226: atastatsamabhivyāhṛtaḥ karmasāmānyavācako yathākārīti śabdastaditaraviśeṣaparaḥ evamanavadyāni karmāṇīti sāmānyataḥ, asmākaṃ sucaritānīti viśeṣa iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:231: evaṃ puṇyātmanāṃ gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyaṃ nirūpya pāpināṃ taccintayā
GSP33brsgor3u:234: śruteśca saṃśaye prathamādhikaraṇena siddhaniyamākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatretyādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:235: yamarājaṃ pāpijanānāṃ samyaggamyaṃ, haviṣā prīṇayateti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:236: pūrvapakṣe puṇyavatāmeva candragatiriti niyamābhāvāt puṇyavaiyarthyaṃ pāpādvairāgyādārḍhyaṃ ceti phalaṃ, siddhānte pāpināṃ candralokadarśanamapi
GSP33brsgor3u:245: saṃyamane yamaloke yamakṛtā yātanā anubhūyāvarohantītyevamārohāvarohāviti yojanā sūtrasya jñeyā /
GSP33brsgor3u:247: samyak parastātprāpyata iti saṃparāyaḥ paralokaḥ tadupāyaḥ sāṃparāyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:248: bālamajñaṃ, viśeṣato vittarāgeṇa mūḍhaṃ mohātpramādaṃ kurvantaṃ prati na bhāti /
GSP33brsgor3u:249: sa ca bālo 'yaṃ strīvittādiloko 'sti na paraloko 'stīti mānī /
GSP33brsgor3u:251: pāpināṃ yamavaśyatāvādiviśeṣaśrutismṛtibalāt'ye vai ke ca'ityaviśeṣaśrutiriṣṭādikāriviṣayatvena vyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:269: etayorvidyākarmaṇoḥ pathidvayasādhanayoranyatareṇāpi sādhanena ye narā na yuktāste janmamaraṇāvṛttirūpatṛtīyamārgasthāni bhūtāni bhavanti,
GSP33brsgor3u:270: kriyāvṛttau loṭ, tena pāpināṃ candragatyabhāvāccandraloko na saṃpūryata iti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:273: apica pāpināṃ candragatau asau lokaḥ saṃpūryeta 'ataśca na
GSP33brsgor3u:277: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:296: 'aṇḍajāni ca jarāyujāni ca svedajāni codbhijjāni ca 'itiśrutyavaṣṭambhena
GSP33brsgor3u:302: anayā śrutyā cāturvidhyaṃ kathamuktaṃ śrutyantare trīṇyevetyavadhāraṇavirodhāditi śaṅkottaratvena
GSP33brsgor3u:303: jīvajaṃ jarāyujaṃ manuṣyādi, bhūmimudbhidya jāyate vṛkṣādikaṃ, udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:308: evaṃ pāpināṃ gatyāgatī vicārya saṃpratīṣṭādikāriṇāmavarohe viśeṣamāha-sābhāvyāpattirūpapatteḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:310: nivṛttāścānuśayinaḥ karmānte drutadehā ākāśaṃ gatā ākāśasadṛśā bhavanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:311: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti
GSP33brsgor3u:312: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati, dhūmasamo bhūtvābhrasamo bhavati
GSP33brsgor3u:313: apo bibhartītyabhraṃ, mehati siñcatīti vṛṣṭikartā meghastatsamo bhūtvā varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ praviśya vrīhiyavādirūpo bhavatīti siddhāntagatyā
GSP33brsgor3u:315: pūrvottarayuktidvayaṃ saṃśyabījaṃ mantavyaṃ, pūrvatra mārgadvayamuktvā tṛtīyatvokteryuktaṃ sthānaśabdasya mārgalakṣakatvamiha tu dugdhaṃ dadhi
GSP33brsgor3u:316: bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt sādṛśyāpattilakṣaṇābījaṃ nāstīti pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:319: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:331: uktaṃ sādṛśyamupajīvya loke gantṛṇāṃ cirāciragatidarśanātsaṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brsgor3u:333: aniyamāt kadācidvilambena yonyāpattiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:335: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:342: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti
GSP33brsgor3u:344: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:346: durniṣprapataraśabdena ciranirgalanalakṣaṇoktā na yuktā, duḥkhena nirgamanamiti mukhyasaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṅgatyā
GSP33brsgor3u:348: atra pūrvapakṣe sthāvaratvanivṛttaye 'dhikāriṇāṃ yatnagauravaṃ, siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti
GSP33brsgor3u:350: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ, vrīhyadestu na dehatvamityata āha-sthāvarabhāvasyeti
GSP33brsgor3u:355: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:358: pūrvavaditi padaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena hetvaṃśatvena ca vyākhyātaṃ yadatra prakaraṇe karmaviśeṣaparāmarśakamucyate
GSP33brsgor3u:360: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti
GSP33brsgor3u:371: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:373: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ tataḥ kiṃ tatrāha-śāstrācceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:374: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:377: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ, aṅgeṣu vidhita iti sthitiḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:378: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt
GSP33brsgor3u:380: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt, pravartakatve vā vidhiranarthāya syāt, ato niravakāśo vidhiḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:384: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:390: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ, anyathopakramopasaṃhārayorvirodhaḥ syāditi matvoktam-ityavirodha iti //26//
GSP33brsgor3u:395: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:398: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor3u:403: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:405: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā
GSP33brsgor3u:406: tadārabhyāpādasamāptervidheyatatpadārthavivekaḥ, tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne rathādisṛṣṭyuktestadabhāvokteśca saṃśayaṃ vadan pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ yojayati-tatra saṃśaya ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:407: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:411: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno
GSP33brsgor3u:412: bhavati, so 'yaṃ lokadvayasandhau bhavatīti saṃdhyaḥ svapnaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:413: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati idaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:414: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:417: lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt nityasvapnasyaiva lokadvayasaṃdhyatvaṃ grāmadvayasparśimārgasya tatsaṃdhyatvavaditi vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor3u:418: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu
GSP33brsgor3u:426: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:433: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:434: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti
GSP33brsgor3u:435: sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:436: kārtsnyamatra jāgrati yā kḷptasāmagrī, tajjanyatvaṃ paramārthavastuno jāgradarthasya kāryasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:438: saṃvṛte saṅkīrṇe, paryetuṃ gantuṃ, viparyetumāgantuṃ, śrāvayati prabuddho janaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:441: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:443: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:446: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:448: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:452: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:453: svapnasya bhrāntimātratve tatsūcito 'pyarthaḥ satyo na syāditi
GSP33brsgor3u:455: mantreṇa devatānugraheṇauṣadhisevayā vā svapnaḥ satyasūcakāścet satyāḥ syurityata āha-tatrāpi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:457: yathā kṛṣidvārā lāṅgalasya gavādijīvananimittatvaṃ tathā svapnabhokturadṛṣṭadvārā svapnasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ na tu kumbhaṃ prati kumbhakārasyeva sākṣād svapnakartṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:459: tathāca svapnasya sakartṛkatvaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstīti hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:466: dvitīyasūtroktaprājñakartṛkatvaheturapi svapnasya kiṃ śrutisiddha uta prājñasya sarveśvaratvāt siddhaḥ, nādya ityāha-yadapyuktamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:467: svayaṃ vihatya jāgraddehaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ kṛtvā, svayaṃ vāsanayā nirmāya, svena bhāsā svīyabuddhivṛttyā svena jyotiṣā svarūpacaitanyena ca svapnamanubhavatītyarthathaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:468: na kevalaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake jīvasya svapnakartṛtvaṃ śrutaṃ kintu kāṭhake 'pītyāha-ihāpīti
GSP33brsgor3u:470: evaṃ hetoḥ śrutisiddhatvaṃ nirasya dvitīyamaṅgīkaroti-na cāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:471: tarhi hetusiddheḥ svapnasya satyatvamityāśaṅkya satyatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ veti vikalpya vyavahārakāle bādhadarśanāt, nādya
GSP33brsgor3u:474: kastarhi svapnasya jāgrato viśeṣo 'tra kathyata ityāśaṅkya prātibhāsikatvamityāha-prāgiti
GSP33brsgor3u:477: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau |
GSP33brsgor3u:478: pūrvaṃ kḷptasāmagryabhāvāt svapno māyetyuktamayuktaṃ satyasaṅkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭisaṃbhavāditi śaṅkāṃ kṛtvā pariharan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-athapi syādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:479: satyasaṃkalpasya hi saṃkalpātsṛṣṭiḥ satyā bhavati jīvasya tvasatyasaṃkalpatvaṃ pratyakṣamiti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:487: parasyābhimukhyenāhaṅgraheṇa dhyānādbandhamokṣāpekṣayā manetroktahānidvayāpekṣayā vā tṛtīyaṃ viśvaiśvaryamaṇimādirūpaṃ martyadehapāte sati siddhe dehe bhavati tadabhogānantaramātmajñānātkevalo dvaitaśūnya āptakāmaḥ prāptasvayañjyotirānando bhavatīti kramamuktirityarthaḥ //5//
GSP33brsgor3u:491: uktaiśvaryatirobhāve dehābhimāno heturiti kathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ, tannirasyāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:501: evaṃ bāhyakaraṇoparame sati manovāsanoddīpitāvidyāvilāsātmakaṃ svapnamātmanaḥsākṣiṇaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvārthaṃ vicārya pratiyogyanuyogibhāvasaṅgatyā svapnāvasthamanolayātmikāṃ suṣuptiṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:504: yatra kāle suptaḥ suṣuptaḥ samasto nirastabāhyakaraṇo manolayātsamyakprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:509: pūrvapakṣe sthānavikalpājjīvasya brahmaikyānirṇayaḥ, siddhānte nāḍībhiḥ purītataṃ gatvāntarhṛdi brahmaṇyeva śeta iti samuccyāt tannirṇaya iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:510: ekapuroḍāśārthatvaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭaṃ nāḍyādīnāmekasmin svāparūpārthe nirapekṣasthānatvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha-nāḍyādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:512: āyatanaśabdātsaptamyartha ādhāratvaṃ gamyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:513: anyatrāvasthādvaye śrānto jīvo viśrāntisthānaṃ prāṇākhyaṃ sadbrahmopasarpati suṣuptāvityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:514: saptamīśrutyā nirapekṣādhāratvabhānādvikalpa āstheyaḥ kadācitsamuccityāpi nāḍyādīnāṃ sthānatvamiti na samuccayaśrutivirodha iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:517: yadā nāḍyaḥ suṣuptisthānaṃ tadā purītatsthānaṃ na bhavatīti śrutasthānatvasya pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt, sa na yukta ityāha-vikalpe hyeṣāmiti
GSP33brsgor3u:522: vyavadhānāvyavadhānābhyāṃ śayanasādhanatvāt samuccayaśca, tathehāpi nāḍīpurītatorjīvasya saṃcāradvārā brahmaṇyeva suptiriti samuccaya
GSP33brsgor3u:524: nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca ekena vākyenopādānānmithaḥ samuccaya ityāha-ekavākyeti
GSP33brsgor3u:525: ādhāratvamātraṃ saptamyartho na nirapekṣatvamato na samuccayasya saptamyā bādha ityāha-na caivamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:527: atra nāḍīśrutau nāḍīṣu bhoktuḥ suptirna vivakṣitā
GSP33brsgor3u:532: 'tāsu tadā bhavatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śruteḥ samuccaya āśrito bhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:534: ākāśe brahmaṇi śeta ityupakramya tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītamiti śeta ityuktaṃ, tathāca nāḍīdvārā purītataṃ gatvā brahmaṇi śeta iti samuccayaḥ siddha ityāha-tathā nāḍīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:535: satā saṃpanno bhavati prājñena saṃpariṣvakta iti satprājñayoḥ śruteḥ pañca suptisthānānītyata āha-satprājñayoriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:541: nanu brahmāpi jīvasya na mukhyaṃ sthānaṃ abhedādityata
GSP33brsgor3u:543: jīvasya brahmaṇyabhedenāvasthānaṃ nāḍīpurītatostu līnopādherjīvasya sthitireva na saṃbhavatītyekārthasāmarthyābhāvānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:544: suṣuptau jīvasya bhedakopādhilayāccautsargikabrahmābhedasya vikalpo na yukta ityāha-apiceti
GSP33brsgor3u:545: kiñca nāḍyādīnāmanyatamasthāne kvacitsuptivādināpi suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ, tacca vaktuṃ na śakyata ityāha-apica sthāneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:546: bhedābhāvo hi bhedajñānābhāve hetuḥ, nāḍīpūritadratasya tu jīvasya
GSP33brsgor3u:552: upādhisaṃbhinnasyaiva nāḍyādau svāpe katipayasaṃnikṛṣṭārthajñānaprasaṅgāt suṣuptivyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:553: upādhilaye tvanyatra jīvasya sthityayogādbrahmaṇyeva svāpa āstheya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:554: evaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasya nāḍīpurītatorbrahmaṇā saha tulyavatsamuccayamaphalatvena dūṣayan guṇapradhānatvena
GSP33brsgor3u:562: tasmādupādhilaye jīvasya brahmābhedādaupādhika eva bheda iti vivekadvākyārthābhedasiddhiriti sthitam //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:567: suṣuptau upādhināśāt karmānusmṛtyāderdarśanācca saṃśaye satyasmādbrahmaṇo jīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityuktamayuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:571: siddhānte tu ajñātabrahmātmanā sthitasyājñānabalena punastasyaivotthānāvaśyaṃbhāvādajñānanāśāya jñānāpekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:574: jñānaṃ vinā buddhyādyupādheratyantanāśābhāvādyayā buddhyopahito jīvaḥ suṣuptau kāraṇātmanā sthitastasyaiva nānākarmānubhavasaṃskāravatyopahita uttiṣṭhatīti siddhāntayati-sa eva tvityādinā sāmikṛtasyārdhakṛtasya ekasyaiva jyotiṣṭomāderanekayajamānakatvāpāto
GSP33brsgor3u:579: pratiniyataṃ gamanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pratiyonyāgacchati jāgaraṇāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:581: iha pūrvaprabodhe ye bhavanti ta eva tadottaraprabodhe bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:583: sa evottiṣṭhatīti niścīyate ityarthaḥ atraivotsūtraṃ yuktyantaramāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:586: asmadādyaśakyamapi vivecanaṃ prāṇyadṛṣṭāpekṣa īśvaraḥ karotīti matvā
GSP33brsgor3u:589: abhede sa vānyo vottiṣṭhati iti cintānavakāśa ityāśaṅkya buddhibhedena jīvabhedāccintetyāha-evaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:590: suṣuptau buddhināśena pratyahaṃ buddhyupādhibhedādekajīvasya vyavahāro na syādityata āha-sa evāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:599: pratyabhijñayotthitasya suptābhedavadviśeṣajñānābhāvāviśeṣeṇa liṅgena suṣuptireva mūrccheti pratyabhijñānātsuṣuptyantargatā mūrccheti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-tisrastāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:600: pūrvapakṣe prasiddhāvasthātaḥ pṛthagātmano mūrcchāto vivekārthaṃ yatnāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte pṛthagyatnadhrauvyamiti bhedaḥ pariśeṣaṃ darśayan siddhāntayati-na tāvadityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:602: aindriyakamarthajñānaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca tasyāsti na mugdhasyeti vaiṣamyoktyā dūṣayati-netyādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:609: uktasārūpyavairūpyābhyāmardhasaṃpattiḥ sarvaiḥ suṣuptidharmairasaṃpanno mugdhaḥ suṣupto na bhavati, sarvairmaraṇāvasthādharmairasaṃpattermṛto 'pi
GSP33brsgor3u:610: na kintu avasthāntaraṃ gata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:611: atra sūtre jīvasya brahmaṇārdhasaṃpattirukteti bhrāntaḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:613: upādhyabhāvaśca mugdhasyāpi mama iti yatastasmāt kṛtsnasaṃpattirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:617: mugdhatvaṃ hi suṣuptasyārdhena niḥsaṃjñatvādidharmeṇa sāmyena saṃpannaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:627: sarvābhiravasthābhiraliptastvamartha iti nirūpayitukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tasya nirviśeṣatvamāha-na sthānato 'pi parasyobhyaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi /
GSP33brsgor3u:630: nirviśeṣatvaṃsav iśeṣatvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgyate jñāpyate yābhistā ubhayaliṅgaḥ śrutayaḥ saṃśayabījatvena santītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:631: yathā viruddhasuṣuptimaraṇobhayarūpaṃ mugdhatvaṃ tathā śrutiprāmāṇyādubhayarūpaṃ brahma dhyeyamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:633: kimubhayarūpatvaṃ svataḥ, uta svato nirguṇasya sarvagandhatvādiviśeṣa upādhitaḥ satyaḥ, āhosvitsvataḥ saviśeṣameva brahmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:637: upādheḥ satyatve 'pi tatkṛtaṃ mithyeti dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇi tūpādhīnāṃ mithyātvāttatkṛto viśeṣo mithyeti kimu vācyamityāha-upādhīnāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:643: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekamatadvacanāt |
GSP33brsgor3u:644: bhidyata iti bhedo viśeṣaḥ, nirviśeṣatvaśrutāvapi viśeṣasyāpi śruterubhayarūpatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-athāpi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:647: kimupādhigata eva rūpabhedo brahmaṇyupacaryate dhyānārthamutopādhiyogātsatyaviruddharūpavattayā brahmaṇo bhedo bhavatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:654: bhoktā jīvo bhogyaṃ śabdādi tayoḥ preritāramīśvaraṃ ca matvā vicārya me mama proktaṃ tatsarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahmaiveti jānīyādityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:658: dvividhaśrutiṣu satīṣu nirviśeṣatve kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkate-kathaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:660: tatparātaparavirodhe tatparaṃ balavaditi nyāyo niyāmaka ityāha-arūpavadeveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:672: upādhīnāṃ kalpitatvādaupādhikasya satyatvādupapatterna satyamubhayarūpatvamiti pūrvamuktaṃ, saṃprati satyaṃ nirviśeṣatvaṃ mithyā saviśeṣatvamityucyata ityubhayarūpatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na pūrvāparavirodha ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:673: dvaitasya mithyātve jñānena bādhādupāsanādivyavahāro na syādityāśaṅkya bādhātprāgeva sa ityāha-satyamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:677: yataḥ śrutiścinmātramāhātaśca viśeṣo mithyeti sūtrārthamāha-āha ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:684: atha dvaitoktyanantaraṃ jñānahetutvānneti neti upadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:685: adhi anyat punaḥ punaradhīhi bho iti nirbandhakāriṇaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca praśne tūṣṇībhāvaṃ tyaktvovāca /
GSP33brsgor3u:687: atastasya tūṣṇīṃbhāva evottaramiti sautraśca atośabdastathārthakaḥ ādimatkāryaṃ tanna bhavatītyanādimat
GSP33brsgor3u:690: sarvabhūtaguṇairdivyagandhādibhiryuktaṃ māṃ mūrtimantaṃ paśyasīti yatsā māyā, ata eva sadvaito bhagavāniti māṃ draṣṭuṃ nārhasi vastuto dvaitātītatvādityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor3u:694: kiñca yathā jalādyupādhikalpitaḥ sūryacandrāderbhedacalanādirdharma evamātmana iti dṛṣṭāntaśruteśca nirviśeṣaṃ tattvamityāha-ata eva copameti /
GSP33brsgor3u:696: yathāyaṃ jyotirmayo vivasvānsvata eko 'pi ghaṭabhedena bhinnāḥ apo
GSP33brsgor3u:697: 'nugacchan bahudhā kriyate evamajo 'yamātmā devaḥ svaprakāśa eko
GSP33brsgor3u:698: 'pyupādhinā māyayā kṣetreṣvanugacchan bhedarūpaḥ kriyata iti yojanā //18//
GSP33brsgor3u:703: ātmano nīrūpatvāddūrasthopādhyabhāvācca māyayā buddhyādiṣu pratibimbabhedo na yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:709: dṛṣṭāntasāmye 'pi nīrūpātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ svabuddhyā kathaṃ kalpyata ityata āha-na cedamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:714: ātmā pratibimbaśūnyaḥ, nīrūpadravyatvāt, vāyuvadityanumāne ākāśe vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:722: dvipadaḥ puro manuṣyādidehāṃścakre catuṣpadaḥ puraḥ paśūnkṛtvā puraścakṣurādyabhivyakteḥ purastāt sa īśvaraḥ pakṣī liṅgaśarīrī bhūtvā pura uktāni śarīrāṇyāviśat, sa ca praviṣṭo 'pi puruṣaḥ pūrṇa evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:724: evaṃ pratibimbabhāvena bhedādeḥ kalpitatvāt nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti
GSP33brsgor3u:727: na sthānato 'pītyādyekamadhikaraṇaṃ, tatra brahmaṇo niṣprapañcatve sthite kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ brahmeti saṃdehe prakāśavaccetyādidvitīyamadhikaraṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ, na sadrūpameva brahma kintu prakāśavacca cidrūpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsgor3u:729: satyaṃ jñānaṃ sadeva somyetyubhayaśruterdvirūpe brahmaṇyarthavattvāditi pūrvapakṣe siddhāntaḥ-āha ca tanmātram /
GSP33brsgor3u:732: dvitīyādhikaraṇasya kiṃ brahmaṇo 'nekarūpatvanirāsaḥ phalam, uta bodharūpatvanirāsa āhosvitsattānirāsa iti vikalpya sarvathāpyānarthakyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:741: evaṃ siddhāntaṃ phalābhāvena dūṣayitvā pūrvapakṣaṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:762: evaṃ sarve śabdā anākārabrahmaparā eveti tanmatamanūdya
GSP33brsgor3u:766: asya jīvabhāvaṃ prāptasyeśvarasya daśa harayo viṣayā haraṇāddaśendriyāṇi prāṇibhedāpekṣayā śatāni sahasrāṇi ca teṣāmīśvarādbhedamāśaṅkyāha-ayamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:769: manomayādiśabdānāṃ mukhyavṛttyā guṇaparatvasaṃbhave niṣedhalakṣaṇāpi na yuktetyāha-śrutyā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:770: kiṃ cākārānākāraśrutidvaividhye sati brahmanākāramevetyatra kiṃ vinigamakamiti śaṅkotthānādasthūlādiśrutīnāṃ nirākāratātparyaṃ niyāmakamiti kathanārthamidaṃ sūtramarthavadbhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:771: sarvaśrutīnāṃ niṣedhārthatve tu śaṅkānutthānānniyāmakasūtraṃ vyarthaṃ syādityāha-sarveṣāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:772: nanūpāsanār'thakavākyānāṃ svārthe phalābhāvāt saphalaniṣedhavākyaśeṣatvamityāśaṅkya phalasya śrutatvānnānyaśeṣatetyāha-phalamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:775: yathā phalavatparamāpūrvākhyaniyogaikyādaṅgapradhānavākyānāmekavākyatā tathā tattvāvabodhakāmasya prapañcapravilayaviṣayaka eko niyogarūpor'tho
GSP33brsgor3u:780: nanu prapañcavilaye brahmalayaḥ syādabhedādityata āha-brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañca iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:781: kāraṇaṃ hi kāryasya svarūpamataḥ kāryanāśe 'pi kāraṇasya na layaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:783: prapañcasya satyasya kalpitasya vā laye vidhiriti vikalpyādyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:785: satyasya jñānādadhvasteḥ musalādinā ca kṛtsnadvaitadhvaṃsāyogāt nabhograsanavidhivadaśakyaviṣayo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ, kiñca śukādimuktyā sarvamuktiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:788: kiñca brahmajñānādau vidhiḥ kiṃ brahmaṇyajñāte jñāte vā /
GSP33brsgor3u:791: upadeśādeva jñāte brahmaṇi sākṣātkāradvaitabādhayoḥ siddhervidhivaiyarthyaṃ siddhasya vidhinā kartumayogādityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor3u:795: ādye jīvanāśādvidhyayogaḥ, dvitīye niyojyāsiddhiḥ,tarhi jñāne vidhipratyayānāṃ kā gatirityata āha-draṣṭavyādiśabdā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:796: nanu śrutaṃ jñānaṃ tyaktvā tatsādhanavyāpāravidhiḥ kimiti kalpyata ityāśaṅkya jñānasya puruṣakṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-jñeyābhimukhasyāpīti
GSP33brsgor3u:797: kiñca jñānavidhivādinā jñeyaṃ brahmāvaśyaṃ vedāntairjñāpanīyaṃ viṣayānavabodhe vidhibodhāyogāt
GSP33brsgor3u:803: anyathādhīḥ kṛtisādhyā cet kriyaiva, kṛtiṃ vinaiva cedbhrāntirevāto mānaṃ vinā vidhito jñānāsiddhermānavastutantre jñāne vidhirmṛṣetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:807: kiñca śrutaṃ brahma na śruto vidhirvedānteṣu tatkalpane ca karmajanyatvānmokṣasyānityatvasātiśayatvādiprasaṅga
GSP33brsgor3u:812: bhinnakriyāvāciśabdaḥ śabdāntaraṃ yathā yajati dadātīti tathehāpi vedopāsīteti śabdabhedaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:818: naca nirguṇavidyāniyoga eka eva saguṇavidyānaṅgīkārāditi vācyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:822: gatistadupāsanayābhyudayasiddheḥ, nirguṇavākyānāṃ tu paramārthālambanatvamityasmadukta eva vibhāgaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:826: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:828: sadrūpatvamāha-prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti
GSP33brsgor3u:829: pṛthivyaptejobhūtatrayaṃ mūrtaṃ vāyvākāśadvayamamūrtamiti rāśidvayamuktvā bhūtadvayasyāmūrtasya sāraḥ 'karaṇātmā hiraṇyagarbho ya eṣa etasmin sūryamaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ'ityuktaḥ, tasya vāsanāmayāni svapnarūpāṇi 'tadyathā māhārajanaṃ, vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:831: tayā liptaṃ vastraṃ māhārajanaṃ, pāṇḍvādikamiti dhavalaṃ kambalādi /
GSP33brsgor3u:832: kecittu śrutimupalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sūkṣmapañcabhūtānyamūrtāni pañcīkṛtāni mūrtāni tataścāmūrtarasatvoktyā karaṇānāṃ pāñcabhautikatvasiddhiriti vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor3u:840: itiśabdānniṣedhyasāmānyasamarpaṇe viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ prakaraṇādrūpadvayasya rūpibrahmaṇaśca niṣaidhyatvabhānātsaṃśayamuktvā pūrvoktaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahma nāstītyākṣepasaṅgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatra prakṛtatveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:842: niradhiṣṭhānaniṣedhādarśanātsarvaniṣedho na yukta ityarucyā prapañce brahmaniṣedha ityāha-athaveti
GSP33brsgor3u:843: ekabrahmaṇa eva niṣedhe nakāradvayasya paunaruktyāmityata āha-abhyāsastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:847: adhiṣṭhānānavaśeṣe tatpramārūpahetvabhāvāt niṣedhavākyārthaḥ pramā na syāt
GSP33brsgor3u:853: adhiṣṭhānasattvaṃ vinā bhrāntiniṣedhayorayogācchūnyavādo na yukta ityuktvā pūrvavādinaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:854: dehātmābhimānavallaukikamānaprāptadvaitasya niṣedho yukto na vedāntapramitabrahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ yaduktaṃ vāṅmanasātītvāt niṣedhārhaṃ brahma iti tatrāha-vāṅmanaseti /
GSP33brsgor3u:855: brahmaṇo vāgādyatītatvaṃ niṣedhārthaṃ na cet kimarthaṃ taduktirityata
GSP33brsgor3u:858: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe'iti rūpadvayasyaiva prādhānyena prakṛtatvānnetīti
GSP33brsgor3u:860: nanu 'ādityamaṇḍale puruṣa'iti brahmāpyatra prādhānyenoktamityāśaṅkya puruṣo liṅgātmā amūrtarasatvaśrutyā
GSP33brsgor3u:862: rūparūpiṇorabheda uktaḥ nanu vāsanāmayaṃ rūpameva kimityupamīyate prasiddharūpameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-amūrtarasasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:865: na cārthataḥ pradhānyadbrahmaṇo niṣedhaḥ rājño bhṛtyo nāstītyatra rājaniṣedhaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:866: kiñcaitra brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyatvāt na niṣedha ityāha-prapañcite ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:867: nanu brahmaṇi niṣiddhasyāpyanyatra sthitisaṃbhavāt kathaṃ kalpitatvamityata āha-tadāspadamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:869: yattu dvaitaniṣedhe pratyakṣādivirodha iti, tatrāha-yuktaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:870: sthāpitaṃ hi ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe pratyakṣādervyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na
GSP33brsgor3u:871: tatvāvedakamiti, atastattvato niṣedhānna virodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:875: yaccoktaṃ niṣedhābhyāṃ rūpaṃ rūpi brahma ca niṣidhyata iti, tatrāha-dvau
GSP33brsgor3u:877: uddeśyavidheyārthānāṃ saṃkhyāsāmye yathākramaṃ saṃbandha iti nyāyaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:880: mūrtaṃ nāmūrtaṃ netyevaṃ viśiṣyaniṣedhe jijñāsā na śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:882: pratiṣedhānupapattyā brahmāstītyavagataṃ bhūyaḥ punaḥ paramastīti śrutiḥ sākṣādapi bravītītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:896: tarhi kadā grāhyamiti śaṅkottaraṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāti-api cainamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:898: indriyairna gṛhyate api tu saṃrādhanena śāstrasaṃskṛtamanasetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:899: bhaktidhyānābhyāṃ pratyagātmanaścitte prakarṣeṇa nidhānaṃ sthāpanaṃ praṇidhānaṃ /
GSP33brsgor3u:904: sa hi teṣāṃ nāśo yadasadarthagrāhitayā sarjanaṃ tasmātteṣāṃ tayā sṛṣṭatvāt, sarvo lokaḥ parāgarthameva paśyati nāntarātmānam /
GSP33brsgor3u:905: kaścittu dhīro dhīmānāvṛttacakṣurniruddhendriyaḥ śuddhe cetasi pratyagātmanaṃ śāstreṇa paśyati mokṣārthītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:906: tataḥ karmaṇā viśuddhacitto jñānākhyasattvotkarṣeṇa saṃdhyāyaṃstaṃ niṣkalaṃ paśyatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:912: yathā prakāśādaya upādhiṣu bhidyante na svataḥ, evaṃ prakāśaścidātmāpi dhyānādikarmaṇyupādho bhidyate svatastasyāvaiśeṣyamekarasatvameva
GSP33brsgor3u:917: jīvasya brahmātmatvaphalaśrutirūpaliṅgādapi bheda aupādhika evetyāha sūtrakāraḥ-ato 'nanteneti
GSP33brsgor3u:926: yadvā sūryaprakāśayorekatejastvadharmāvacchedena bhedābhedavajjīvaparayorapi ekenaivātmatvadharmeṇa bhedābhedau śrutibalātsvīkāryāviti sūtradvayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:927: kuṇḍalatvaṃ valayākāratvaṃ, ābhogatvaṃ vakrākāratvaṃ, prāṃśutvaṃ dīrghadaṇḍākāratvaṃ udgatamukhatvamādiśabdārthaḥ END BsRp_3,2.6.27-28
GSP33brsgor3u:932: dharmabhedanaikadharmeṇa vā bhedābhedasvīkāre bhedasya satyatvādabhedavadanivṛttiḥ syāt ekatraiva bhedābhedasvīkāre loke virodhakathoccheda ityapi draṣṭavyaṃ, tasmāt niṣprapañcaṃ cidekarasaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:937: yaduktaṃ neti netītyādiśrutibhiḥ brahmātiriktaṃ vastu niṣidhyata iti,
GSP33brsgor3u:940: yadyapi dyubhvādyadhikaraṇe setuśabdo vidhārakatvena gauṇo vyākhyātastathāpyunmānādiśrutīnāṃ gatimajānato 'yaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:941: tatronmānādiśrutīnāṃ mukhyatvāt, sadvayaṃ brahmeti phalaṃ siddhānte tūktādvitīyatatpadalakṣyasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:944: jāṅgalaṃ vātabhūyiṣṭhamiti vaidyokteḥ vātapracuro deśo jāṅgalaṃ, iha tu deśamātraṃ grāhyam
GSP33brsgor3u:945: diśaścatasraḥ kalāḥ prakāśavānnāma pādaḥ, pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra
GSP33brsgor3u:946: ityanantavānnāma pādaḥ, agniḥ sūryaścandro vidyuditi jyotiṣmānnāma pādaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:947: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅmana ityāyatanavānnāma pāda iti catuṣpādbrahmeti pādānāmardhāni aṣṭau śaphā asyetyaṣṭāśaphaṃ, pādeṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:949: ṣoḍaśapaṇaparimitaṃ tāmraṃ kārṣāpaṇasaṃjñaṃ bhavati tadvatsadvayaṃ brahma,
GSP33brsgor3u:961: yadanyattatkiṃ sādyanādi vā, nādyaḥ mānābhāvāt kāryasya
GSP33brsgor3u:966: kiṃ setuśrutyā parasiddhirarthādvā, nādya ityuktvā dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-tatra
GSP33brsgor3u:970: vidhārakatvaṃ tu kalpitadvitīyāpekṣayāpi yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:976: vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotrāṇi manasaḥ pādā agnivāyvādityadiśa ākāśasya pādā dhyānārthaṃ kalpitāstadvadbrahmaṇa unmānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:978: pādakalpanāṃ vināpi vyavahāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:979: kārṣāpaṇasya vyavahārāya pādakalpanāvat mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya brahmaṇa unmānakalpanetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:984: sthānamupādhibuddhyādiḥ ekasyaivopādhinā bhinnasyopādhiśāntau satyāṃ saṃbandha upacaryate
GSP33brsgor3u:985: yathā saurālokāderaṅgulyādyupādhinā bhinnasyopādhiviyoge mahālokādyātmanā saṃbandhopacārastadvat tathāditya cakṣuṣoḥ sthānayorbhedāddhiraṇmayapuruṣabhedakalpanetyarthaḥ //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:989: mukhyāveva saṃbandhabhedau kiṃ na syātamityatra sūtram-upapatteśceti
GSP33brsgor3u:993: svarūpeṇa brahmaṇā jīvasya saṃbandho bhedanivṛttirūpo yujyate na mukhyaḥ saṃyogādiḥ vastudvayāsattvāt tathā bhedo 'pi na svata ekatvaśruterityarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brsgor3u:1001: satyaprapañcasaṃbandhāyogāttavaiva sarvagatatvaśrutivirodha iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhānenādhyastaṃ jagadvyāptamadhyastatvāt rajjvā vyāptasarpavat, iti nyāyaḥ //37//
GSP33brsgor3u:1006: nirviśeṣatvādanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalahetutvākhyaḥ iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ devādīnāṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1007: aniṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ nārakiṇāṃ, vyāmiśraṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ, saṃsāro janmamṛtipravāhaḥ gocaraḥ āśrayo yasya tatsaṃsāragocaram /
GSP33brsgor3u:1009: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1011: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva phaladātṛtvamiti śaṅkānirāsenoktalakṣyārthanirvāhakavācyārthanirṇayārthamasyādhikaraṇasyārambha iti matvā siddhāntaṃ tāvadāha-tatra tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1014: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati, āhosvidapūrvātphalasiddhiḥ, nādya ityāha-abhāvāditi
GSP33brsgor3u:1018: apūrvaṃ kiṃ svatantrameva phaladānāya pravartate, cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ vā,
GSP33brsgor3u:1033: 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1038: vidhiśrutirvidhyarthaḥ, tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1040: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1041: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā, ādya
GSP33brsgor3u:1043: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1044: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brsgor3u:1052: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor3u:1062: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1063: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1066: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1070: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1072: saguṇavidyāsveva bhedābhedacintā kriyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ tvaikyaṃ siddhamiti vācyārtharūpaguṇopasaṃhāramātraṃ kriyate vākyārthanirṇayāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1075: atra tu mithobhinnāstāḥ kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyānte na veti nāmādibhedāccodanādyaviśeṣācca saṃśayaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1076: pūrvapakṣe vidyābhedādguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ siddhānte tvabhedādupasaṃhāra iti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1078: tatroktā hetavo nāmādayo vidyābhedārthamihocyante 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta'ityatra prakṛtajyotiṣṭomānuvādena sahasradakṣiṇākhyaguṇavidhimāśaṅkya jyotiritipadasya
GSP33brsgor3u:1079: karmāntaranāmatvasaṃbhave jyotiṣṭomalakṣakatvāyogādatheti prakaraṇavicchedācca jyotiṣṭomātkarmāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadakṣiṇākaṃ vidhīyata iti nāmnaḥ karmabhedakatvamuktama /
GSP33brsgor3u:1081: taptaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhnā kaṭhinamāmikṣā, tatra dravaṃ jalarūpaṃ vājinamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:1082: bhedaḥ, 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityatra vaiśvadevyāmikṣāyāge vājinākhyaguṇavidhiḥ vājibhya iti viśvedevānuvādādityāśaṅkyāmikṣāṃ paryupasarjanatvenoktaviśvadevānāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1083: vājibhya ityanuvādāyogādutpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāvaruddhe karmaṇi vājinadravyasyānākāṅkṣitasya vidhyayogādvājidevatāko vājinayāgaḥ karmāntaramiti dravyadevatākhyarūpabhedātkarmabhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1086: tathā retonyūnā vāgādayaśchāndogye tatsahitā vājināmiti prāṇavidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1087: kārīrivākyādhyayane taittirīyakāṇāṃ bhūmau bhojanaṃ dharmaviśeṣo nānyeṣāṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1089: aśvamedhādhyayane 'śvaghāsānayanaṃ keṣāñcideva nānyeṣāṃ, naca tānyeva kārīryādīni karmāṇi dharmaviśeṣamapekṣante nāpekṣante ceti yuktaṃ, ato dharmaviśeṣācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitastathātrāpi muṇḍakādhyayena keṣāñcideva śirasyaṅgārapātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vrataṃ nānyeṣāmiti vidyābhedaḥ syāt punaruktirabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1090: yathā 'samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati'iti yajatyabhyāsātprayājānāṃ bheda uktastathā śākhāntare 'bhyāsādvidyābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1091: ādipadānnindādigrahaḥ, 'prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayājjuhvati ye 'gnihotram'ityanuditahomasya 'yadudite sūrye prātarjuhuyādyathātithaye pradrutāya śūnyāyāvasāthāyāhāryaṃ haranti tādṛgeva tat'ityuditahomasya ca
GSP33brsgor3u:1094: ete nindāprayaścitte vedāntavidyāsu na vidyete iti nodāhriyete /
GSP33brsgor3u:1095: yathā sarvaśākhāvihitasya karmaṇo jñātuṃ kartuṃ cāśakterbhedastathā sarvavedāntādhyayanajñānādyaśaktestattadvedāntavidyābhedaḥ syāt tathā śākhānāṃ sarvāsāmekarūpā samāptirnocyate kintu kasyāścitkvacitkarmaṇi samāptirataḥ samāptivacanabhedātpratiśākhaṃ karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitaḥ, tathā kasyacidvedāntasyoṅkārasārvātmye samāptiḥ kasyacidanyatreti vidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1096: anyārthadarśanamarthavādastadbhedātkarmabhedavadvidyābheda iti pūrvapakṣasūtroktā hetavo darśitāste kecitsiddhānte pūrvapakṣe cātropayuñjanta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1097: tathā śabdāntarābhyāsasaṃkhyāguṇaprakriyānāmadheyāni karmabhedakāni, tatra nāmadheyaṃ guṇo rūpamabhyāsaśceti trayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ, yajeddadyājjuhuyāditi prakṛtiśabdabhedena dhātvarthabhedāttadavacchinnabhāvanākhyakarmabheda
GSP33brsgor3u:1099: āhutīrjuhoti'iti saṃkhyayā karmabhedavat 'vāyuprāṇau'iti dvitvasaṃkhyayā saṃvargavidyābhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1105: uktanāmādibhiragnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhede prāpte śākhāntarādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'ekaṃ vā
GSP33brsgor3u:1110: yathā jyeṣṭhatvādiguṇakaprāṇavidyā sarvaśākhāsvekā tathā pañcāgnividyāpyekā phalasaṃyogādyaviśeṣāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:1113: kāṭhakamityādināmnā karmabhedo na yuktaḥ, kutaḥ acodanābhidhānatvātkāṭhakādiśabdānāṃ granthanāmatayā karmavācitvābhāvādato bhinnanāmakaśākhāgranthabhede 'pi tādvihitaṃ karmaikameva, alparūpabhedo
GSP33brsgor3u:1114: 'pi na karmaikyavirodhī, dharmaviśeṣastvadhyayanāṅgaṃ na karmāṅgamato na karmabhedakaḥ śākhābhede
GSP33brsgor3u:1117: evaṃ samāptivacanabhedo 'pyaprayojaka ityaivaṃ karmābhedapramāṇaprābalye bhedahetavaḥ parihṛtā ityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor3u:1125: asya pṛthakśāstratvātkarmanyāyānāṃ mānasavidyāsu vinā sūtraṃ duryojatvācca punaruktigandho 'pi nāstīti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1126: nanu tasya mṛtasya dāhārthamagnirantyeṣṭigataḥ ṣaṣṭho yaḥ prasiddhavadvājibhiruktaḥ sa chāndogye upasaṃhārya iti na rūpabhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1128: astu prajananaguṇavato retaso vājināmāvāpaśchandogānāṃ ca tasyodvāpastataḥ kimityata āha-āvāpeti
GSP33brsgor3u:1132: ito 'smāllokādiṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1133: nanu chāndogye 'gnimātraṃ śrutaṃ vājibhistu samidādiviśeṣaḥ paṭhyate iti rūpabhedastadavasthaḥ, tatrāha-vājasaneyinastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1134: ṣaṣṭhāgnestadviśeṣasya cānuvādamātratvenānupāsyatvātpañcāgnaya evopāsyā ubhayatreti na rūpabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1136: dyulokādīnāṃ pañcānāmanagnīnāmagnitvasaṃpattividhinaivārthātpañcatvaṃ saṃpattikalpitāgnīnāṃ siddhamanūdyate na dhyeyatvena vidhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1137: chandogairvājiśākhāsthaṃ reta upasaṃhartavyamityuktvānupasaṃhāre 'pi na vidyābheda ityāha-na cāvāpeti //2//
GSP33brsgor3u:1140: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:1141: evaṃ rūpabhedo na vidyābhedaka ityuktvā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi na bhedaka ityāha-svādhyāyasyeti
GSP33brsgor3u:1142: godānavadadhyayanāṅgatvena śirovratamātharvaṇikānāṃ sūtre vihitaṃ na vidyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1144: etatprakṛtaṃ muṇḍakamananuṣṭhitaśirovrato naro nādhīta iti śrutermuṇḍakādhyayanāṅgameva śirovratamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1145: nanu vidyāṅgatvenāpi idaṃ vrataṃ śrutamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1146: sarvaśākhāsu brahmavidyaikaiva cedvidyāsaṃyuktaṃ vratamapi sarvatra saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brsgor3u:1149: tasya śirovratasya muṇḍakādhyayane niyama ityatra savavaditi nidarśananirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1151: atharvaṇaiḥ svasūtre udita eko 'gnirekarṣisaṃjñayā prasiddhastasminnagnau kāryā iti yathā niyamyante tathetyarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor3u:1158: kiñca śākhāntaroktapādārthasya śākhāntare siddhavatparāmarśo vidyaikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-tathā mahadbhayamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1159: eṣa nara etasminnadvaye 'lpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadā paśyatyatha tadā tasya saṃsārabhayaṃ bhavatyeva, yasmādviduṣo narasya bhedadarśinastadeva brahma bhayaṅkaraṃ bhavati, brahmaivāhamityamanvānasyetyarthaḥ prādeśamātramupāsta iti siddhavadupāsanaṃ vaiśvānaravidyaikyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1170: śākhābhede samānavidyāyāṃ śrutā guṇā yathāśruti vyavasthitā uta ekatrāśrutā itaraśākhāta upasaṃhartavyā iti saṃdehe vidyaikye 'pi tatra tatroktaireva guṇairvidyopakārasiddheḥ śākhābhedena guṇā vyavasthitā iti
GSP33brsgor3u:1177: nanvāgneyayāgāvaruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ tato 'bhinne saurye prāptivadvidyāntarasthaguṇānāṃ vidyāntare prāptiḥ kiṃ syādityata
GSP33brsgor3u:1179: prakṛtiguṇānāṃ vikāre prāptiryuktā vidyānāṃ tu prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāsiddherna tatprāptirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1189: 'te ha devāḥ sāttvikavṛttayaḥ prāṇā anyonyamucūrhantedānīmasminyajñe udgīthenaudgātreṇa karmaṇā rajastamovṛttirūpānasurānatītya devatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1190: gacchāmaḥ'iti te caivaṃ nirdeṣamudgīthakartāramupāsyaṃ nirdhārayituṃ kṛtasaṃvādāḥ prathamaṃ vācyaṃ parīkṣitavantastvamaudgātraṃ no 'smākaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1191: kurviti tayā tvanṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā ghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanāṃsyapi kāmenāsurapāpmanā grastānīti ninditvā āsanyamāsye bhavaṃ mukhamadhyasthaṃ prāṇamupāsyaṃ nirdhāritavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1194: atra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenodgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyena vidyaikyamiti pūrvapakṣe mitho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte saṃjñaikye 'pi vidyaikyāpavādādanupasaṃhāra iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1195: evaṃ yatra pūrvanyāyena pūrvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiriti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1197: saṃpūrṇodgīthakarmakartā prāṇo vājināmupāsyaḥ, udgāyeti kartṛśabdācchandogānāṃ tūdgīthāvayava oṅkāraḥ prāṇadṛṣṭyopāsyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1198: oṃmityetadakṣaramudgīthamityupakramya prāṇamudgīthamiti karmarūpatvaśabdāt, tathāca kartṛkarmaṇorūpāsyayorbhedādvidyayoranyathātvaṃ bheda iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1202: asurātyayābhiprāyaḥ asurajayārthaṃ saṃvādaḥ, yathāśmānaṃ prāpya loṣṭo
GSP33brsgor3u:1203: vidhvaṃsate tathā prāṇaṃ hantumāgatā asurāstasya vīryeṇa svayameva dhvastā iti śrutamubhayatretyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1205: udgīthakartṛrūpatvena prāṇasyobhayatra śrutatvādekatra śrutaṃ kartṛtvamapyubhayatra draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1211: tadavayavamityarthaḥ pṛthivyādirasānāṃ rasatama oṅkāraḥ, āptiḥ samṛddhiriti guṇānuktvā guṇavatyoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānāyākhyāyikā prastutetyāha-rasatameti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1213: saṃpūrṇasāmabhaktiparamastu, prāṇamudgīthamityatrāpyudgīthakartā prāṇa upāsya iti vyākhyāyatāmityata āha-tatra yadyudgītheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1214: oṅkāropāstyupakramasaṅga udgīthapade kartṛlakṣaṇā ceti doṣadvayaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1215: nanu siddhānte 'pi tatpade 'vayavalakṣaṇā svīkāryā tato varaṃ kartṛlakṣaṇā śrutyantarānugrahāttathā copasaṃhāre kartṛprāṇopāstiniścayādupakrame 'pi
GSP33brsgor3u:1222: evaṃ chāndogye oṅkāra upāsya ukta itaratra tu prāṇa ityupāsyabhedādvidyābheda ityāha-vājeti
GSP33brsgor3u:1225: tatrodgītha upāsyatayā noktaḥ kintu prāṇasyopāsyasya guṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1232: ekatrodgātā prāṇa upāsyo 'nyatroṅkāra ityantaraṅgopāsyarūpabhede spaṣṭe sati bahiraṅgārthavādasāmyamātreṇa nopāsanaikyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1234: 'vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye
GSP33brsgor3u:1235: madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave
GSP33brsgor3u:1237: asyārthaḥ-yasya yajamānasya caturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābhrāntyādarśakarmārthaṃ pravṛttasya purastātpūrvaṃ havistaṇḍuladadhipayorūpaṃ niruptaṃ darśadevatābhyo 'gnyādibhyaḥ saṅkalpitaṃ candramāśca paścādabhyudeti
GSP33brsgor3u:1238: tametaṃ yajamānaṃ kālavyatyayāparādhāttadeva niruptaṃ haviḥ prajādinārdhayati viyojayati śatruṃ cāsya vardhayati yasmātkālabhrāntimānyajamānaḥ, ye madhyamādibhāvena tredhā bhūtāstaṇḍulā dadhyādisahitā niruptāstānvibhajedagnyādibhyo viyojayadviyojya ca dātṛtvādiguṇakānagnyādibhyo darśadevābhinnebhyo nirvapediti dadhan dadhani sthaviṣṭhataṇḍulacaruṃ śṛte dugdhe 'ṇiṣṭhacarumityarthaḥ atra kālāparādhe devāntarayuktaṃ prāyaścittarūpaṃ darśādbhinnaṃ karma vidhīyata iti prāpte taṇḍulatredhātvādyanuvādena vibhajediti haviṣaḥ prakṛtadevaviyogena tasminneva darśakarmaṇi devatāntarasaṃbandhamātravidhānaṃ na karmāntaramiti siddhāntitam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1239: evamabhyudayavākye kālāparādhenopakramāddarśakarmaṇyeva haviṣaḥ pūrvadevatābhyo 'panayo viyogo 'dhyavasitaḥ, paśukāmavākye tu yadyapi ye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣaṇave
GSP33brsgor3u:1240: śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarumiti nirdeśo 'bhyudayavākyena samo 'sti, tathāpi yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso
GSP33brsgor3u:1241: 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryāditi nityaṃ darśakarma samāpya punardehārthaṃ vatsāpākaraṇavidhyupakramātpaśukāmasya yāgāntaravidhireva nābhyudayavākyenārthaikyamiti tathā prakṛte 'pi nirdeśasāmyaṃ na vidyaikyaprayojakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1244: para iti sakārāntaṃ parasmāt paraścāsau varācca varatara iti parovarīyānityekaṃ padam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1250: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api |
GSP33brsgor3u:1256: asati bādhake saṃjñaikyamapi mānaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyeti saṃjñaikyātsarvaśākhāsu tadvidyaikyaṃ, tathā pañcāgnyādividyaikyamityādyasūtre darśitamityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:1265: pūrvamudgātṛkarmātmakodgīthāvayavatvamoṅkārasya dhyeyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ siddhavatkṛtya dhyeyabhedādvidyābhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1266: atra pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktasiddhāntāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-caśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1268: yasyodgīthasya buddhiroṅkāre 'dhyasyate tadvācakodgīthaśabdasyoṅkāre lakṣaṇā syāttadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇaparatvāttathā saṃbandho 'pyasiddhaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1269: kalpanīyaḥ, pratīkopāsteḥ phalaṃ ca kalpyamiti gauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1272: 'oṅkāra āptiḥ samṛddhiriti' 'ya upāste sa kāmānāpnoti'iti śrutaṃ phalaṃ nādhyāsasyetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1274: bhrāntiścet nivarteta na tu nivartata ityabhrantirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1275: kiñca tattvabodhakādvākyādbhrāntyapavādo bhavati nedaṃ vākyaṃ tattvaparamityāha-naceti
GSP33brsgor3u:1281: adhyāsapakṣe tadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇayogarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā avayavalakṣaṇā tu saṃnikṛṣṭā avayavāvayavisaṃbandhasya
GSP33brsgor3u:1282: kḷptatvāt, paṭāvayave dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti loke prayogācca /
GSP33brsgor3u:1283: nāmādau brahmaśabdasya tvagatyā brahmabuddhigrāhyatvaguṇalakṣaṇāśritā tatra pratīkopāstervivakṣitatvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:1284: iha tu pratīkopāstividhikalpane āptyādiguṇakoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ syādataḥ sarvavedavyāpyoṅkāranirāsenoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānārthaṃ viśeṣaṇameva samañjasaṃ kalpnālāghavāditi siddham //9//
GSP33brsgor3u:1294: te ca guṇāḥ prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ niścitya vāgādibhistasminnarpitā iti śākhādvayasaṃmator'thaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1301: yathā vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyaṃ siddhamatho tathā ya evaṃ śraiṣṭhyaguṇaṃ vidvānupāste sa prāṇe śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā śreṣṭho bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1302: evaṃ jātīyakavidyaikyātprāptamārthikaṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātamevaṃśabdo na gṛhṇāti śrutāvalambitvāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-asyeranniti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1303: vājasaneyibrāhmaṇe tāvadevaṃśabdena vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātasya prāṇavidyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ saiva vidyā kauṣītakiśrutau pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:1304: tathāca guṇānāṃ guṇyavinābhāvenārthataḥ prāptānāmapi śrutaguṇairavirodhātsahaiva śrutamārthaṃ ca guṇajātaṃ śrutyarthābhyāṃ saṃnihitatvāviśeṣātkauṣītakigatenaivaṃśabdena parāmṛśyata ityāha-tathāpīti
GSP33brsgor3u:1308: aparigaṇitā api guṇāḥ śrutā evetyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1317: brahmaṇastu nirviśeṣatvātsvaśākhāgatapadaireva pramitisiddhervyarthaḥ padāntaropasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1319: ānandatvasatyatvajñānatvādisāmānyāni brahmaṇi kalpitā dharmāsteṣāṃ sarvaśākhāsūpasaṃhāro nāma tadvācakānandādipadānāmekavākyatayoccāraṇaṃ ānandaḥ satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma śuddhamadvayamātmeti tāni ca samānādhikaraṇāni padāni viruddhadharmatyāgena sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtāmekāmakhaṇḍavyaktiṃ kṣayanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1320: na caikenaiva padena lakṣyasiddheḥ padāntaraṃ vyarthamiti vācyaṃ,

GSP33brsgor3u:1333: putradarśanasukhaṃ priyaṃ tadvārtādinā modastasya vidyādyatiśaye pramoda ityevaṃ tāratamyavanto dharmāstvadvaye jñeye na prāpnuvanti teṣāmabrahmasvarūpāṇāṃ brahmajñānānupayogāditi bhāvaḥ teṣāṃ brahma dharmatvaṃ cāsiddhamityāha-na caita iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1354: atratvabrahmasvabhāvasyārthādiparatvasyānupasaṃhāryasya tadupāyatvamucyata ityekaphalakatvaṃ saṃgatiḥ tattatparatvaviśiṣṭatvenārthādīnāmapūrvatayā pratipādyānāṃ bhedādvākyabhedo na doṣa iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1355: utsūtrasiddhāntaṃ pratijñāya sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-puruṣa eveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1356: phalavattve satyapūrvatvātpuruṣasyaiva prādhānyena pratipādyatvamaphalārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ tu taccheṣatvenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1357: kiñca 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā'iti vedaḥ paraniṣedhaliṅgena sarvabādhāvadhitvaliṅgena ca puruṣe tātparyaṃ darśayanpūrvasmātpūrvasmādaparasyāparasya paratvoktistadartheti
GSP33brsgor3u:1359: arthādīnāmatroktirādhyānāya tattatparatvādhyānapūrvakaṃ puruṣadarśanāyaiva svataḥ prayojanābhāvāditi sūtraṃ yojayati-ādhyānāyeti //14//
GSP33brsgor3u:1372: ambhaḥ svargaḥ, marīcayo 'ntarikṣalokaḥ, maro martyalokaḥ, āpaḥ pātālaloka ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1376: puruṣavākyādbhedaprasaṅgādarthādivākyānāṃ nārthādipratipādakatvamityuktaṃ tadvadihāpi prajāpate reto devā iti pūrvasmātprajāpativākyādbhedaprasaṅgādātmā vā ityādivākyasya na brahmaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-na paramātmetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1383: ambho marīcīrmaramāpa iti sūtrayitvā svayameva śrutirvyācaṣṭe-pareṇa divaṃ divaḥ parastāddivi pratiṣṭhitaścandrāmbhasā vyāpto yo lokaḥ tadambhaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1384: antarikṣaṃ marīcayaḥ, pṛthivī maraḥ, yā adhastāttā āpa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1392: kiñca prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāḥ prati bhogārthaṃ gāmānayallokasraṣṭā tathāśvamānayat /
GSP33brsgor3u:1393: tāstu gavāśvaprāptyā na tṛptāstataḥ puruṣaśarīre ānīte tā abruvaṃstṛptāḥ sma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1394: ayaṃ ca vyavahāro lokasraṣṭuḥ prajāpatitve liṅgamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1406: etameva sīmānaṃ mūrdhnaḥ keśavibhāgāvasānaṃ vidārya chidraṃ kṛtvā etayā brahmarandhrākhyayā dvārā liṅgaviśiṣṭaḥ praviṣṭavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1407: māṃ vinā yadi vāgādibhiḥ svasvavyāpāraḥ kṛtaḥ, atha tadāhaṃ ka iti tvaṃpadārthaṃ vicārya svayametadeva śodhitamātmānaṃ brahma tatamaṃ vyāptatamamapaśyat /
GSP33brsgor3u:1409: prajñā cidātmā netraṃ nīyate 'neneti niyāmakaṃ yasya tat prajñānetraṃ cidātmaniyamyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1414: pūrvapakṣe sattāsāmānye brahmātmatvasaṃpadupāstiśchāndogye, vājaśrutau nirguṇavidyeti bhedānmithoguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1418: pūrvatra vākyaikyādarthādiparatvaṃ tyaktvā vidyaikyamuktamiha tu sadātmaśabdābhyāṃ jātyātmavācibhyāmupakramabhedādvākyabhede sati vidyābheda iti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1428: suptau jīvaḥ satā saṃpannau bhavatīti kathanaṃ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1429: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatviti paricodanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1430: saditipadena sattāśrayā ucyate na jātimātraṃ, kartṛvāciśatṛpratyayāntatvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:1431: tathā copakrame sattāśrayasāmānyoktau ka āśraya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyaśeṣādātmeti niścīyata ityāha-naceti
GSP33brsgor3u:1432: sacchabdasyātmānātmasādhāraṇyamupetyoktaṃ tadapi nāsti ātmapadavatsatpadasya vyaktivācitvādvyaktiśca bādhāyogya cidātmaiveti na vācichandogayorūpakramavaiṣamyamityāha-sacchabdeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1434: vājivākye tvamarthasya tadarthaparyantasya lakṣyasya pratipādanaṃ chāndogyavākye tu tadarthasya tvamarthaparyantasya pratipādanamiti prakārabhede 'pi vākyārthaikyādvidyaikyamiti phalitamāha-tasmāditi END BsRp_3,3.8.17
GSP33brsgor3u:1438: 'me kimannaṃ kiṃ vāsaḥ'iti prāṇena pṛṣṭā vāgādayaḥ ūcuḥ, 'yadidaṃ kiṃ cāśvabhya ā kṛmibhyastatte 'nnamāpo vāsaḥ'iti sarvaprāṇibhirbhujyamānaṃ yadidaṃ prasiddhaṃ śvādiparyantamannaṃ tatprāṇasya tavānnamāpa
GSP33brsgor3u:1442: kiṃ tat, bhojanātpūrvamūrdhvaṃ cācāmantīti yattadadbhiḥ prāṇaṃ paridadhatyācchādayantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1444: tat tasmādityuktārthaṃ yataḥ pūrve vidvāṃso 'śanātprāgūrdhvaṃ cācāmanta etamevānāṃ prāṇaṃ tattenācamanenānagnamācchāditaṃ kurvanto manyante
GSP33brsgor3u:1447: saṃdigdhasadupakramasya vākyaśeṣānnirṇayavadācāmantīti padasya vidhitvasaṃdehe ācāmediti vākyaśeṣādvidhitvanirṇaya iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1449: pūrvapakṣe prāṇavidyāṅgatvenāpūrvācamanaṃ vihitamanyatropasaṃhartavyamiti phalaṃ siddhānte tasyāvidheyatvānnāṅgatvenopasaṃhāra iti vivekaḥ ubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syādityarucyāpakṣāntaramāha-athaveti praśastaṃ hīdamācamanaṃ yasmādanena prāṇamanagnaṃ manyanta iti stutiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1452: smṛtyā śudyarthaṃ kāryatvena vihitasakalakarmāṅgatayā prāptācamanānuvādenāpūrvamanagnatādhyānameva vidhīyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1453: smārtamācamanaṃ śrutyā nānūdyate kiṃ tvanayā śrutyā vihitaṃ samṛtyānūdyata iti śaṅkate-nanviti
GSP33brsgor3u:1455: 'dvijo nityamupaspṛśet'ityādyā smṛtiḥ ācamanāntaravidhimupetya mūlamūlitvaṃ nirastaṃ, saṃprati vidhirasiddha ityāha-naceyaṃ śrutiriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1457: apsu prāṇavāsastvadhyānākhyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ prāṇavidyāṅgatvena vidhīyata ityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1462: kiñca yathā pūrvavākye prāṇasyānnadhyānamaṅgaṃ vihitaṃ tathātrāpsu vāsodhyānaṃ vidhīyate anyathācamanavidhau pūrvatra dhyānavidhiruttaratra kriyāvidhirityardhavaiśasaṃ syādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1463: bhakṣayediti śabdābhāvācchvādyannasya sarvasya manuṣveṇepāsakena bhoktumaśakyatvācca na pūrvavākye kriyāvidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1465: anagnaṃ manyanta ityatra vāsastvadhyānamapi na vidheyaṃ doṣasāmyaditi
GSP33brsgor3u:1467: ubhayorapyanuvādatve vaiphalyādavaśyamekānuvādenaikaṃ vidheyaṃ tacca vidheyaṃ vāsodhyānameva vāsaḥ kāryasyānagnatvasyākhyānādapūrvatvācceti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1469: ācāmediti na vidhiḥ kintu viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavya itivadanuvāda ityatra liṅgamāha-ata eveti

GSP33brsgor3u:1481: yatpunaruktaṃ, tadvidyāntaramiti na vyāptiḥ prāṇapañcāgnyādividyāsu vyabhicāradityāśaṅkya

GSP33brsgor3u:1485: uktaguṇoktirna vṛthā katipayaguṇaviśiṣṭopāsyābhedapratyabhijñānārthatvādata upāsyarūpābhedādbhinnaśākhāsviva samānaśākhāyāmapi vidyaikyamiti siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yatheti /

GSP33brsgor3u:1492: sadbhūtatrayaṃ tyadvāyvākāśātmakaṃ, satya parokṣabhūtātmakaṃ hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ brahmopakramya, taduktaṃ yatsatyaṃ tat sa yo 'sāvādityaḥ kiṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tatra sthāne puruṣaḥ karaṇātmakaḥ sa evādhyātmamakṣisthānastha ityupadiśya 'tasya bhūriti śiro bhuva iti bāhuḥ svariti pādau'iti vyāhṛtirūpaṃ śarīramuktvā dve upaniṣado rahasyadevatānāmanī upadiśyete tasyādityamaṇḍalasthasyāhariti nāma prakāśakatvāttasyākṣisthasyāhamiti nāma pratyaktvāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1493: idaṃ nāmadvayaṃ viṣayastatra nāminaḥ satyākhyasya brahmaṇa ekatvātsthānabhedokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti
GSP33brsgor3u:1494: pūrvapakṣe pratisthānaṃ nāmadvayānuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte yathāśrutyaikaikanāmānuṣṭhānamiti phalam
GSP33brsgor3u:1499: ādityaraśmīnāṃ cakṣuṣa cakṣuṣaścāditye pratiṣṭhānāditi vyatiṣaktapāṭho mithaḥ saṃśleṣapāṭhastābhyāṃ vidyaikyasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1506: nāmyaikyāt nāmasaṃkaro yuktaḥ, tathā cākṣistho 'hariti nāmavān satyabrahmatvādādityasthavaditi prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃyojayati-naveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1513: pratidṛṣṭāntasya svarūpasaṃbandhitvādviśiṣṭe dhyeye prakṛte dṛṣṭāntaṃ nāstītyāha-grāmeti
GSP33brsgor3u:1518: vidyaikyādevopasaṃhārasiddhāvatideśo vṛthā syāttasmādekavidyāyāmapi sthānabhedenoktaguṇānāṃ vinātideśamanupasaṃhāra iti siddham //22//
GSP33brsgor3u:1523: brahmaiva jyeṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhāni, nilopaścāndasaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1524: vīryāṇi parākramaviśeṣā ākāśotpādanādayaḥ, tāni ca vīryāṇi saṃbhṛtāni nirvighnaṃ samṛddhāni, sarvaniyantuḥ kārye vighnakarturasattvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1525: tacca jyeṣṭhaṃ brahmāgne devādyutpatteḥ prāgeva divaṃ svargamātatāna vyāptavatsadā sarvavyāpakamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1529: anārabhyādhītabrahmavibhūtīnāṃ brahmasaṃbandhena sarvabrahmavidyāsu pratyabhijñānādupasaṃhāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1531: saṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca saṃbhṛtidyuvyāpti tadapi sarvatra nopasaṃhartavyamupaniṣadoriva vyavasthāpakaviśeṣayogāditi sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1532: ādhyātmikāyatanaviśeṣayuktāsu vidyāsvādhidaivikavibhūtīnāṃ pratyabhijñāne hetvabhāvānna prāptirityukte hetuṃ śaṅkate-nanvetāsviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1536: sthānaviśiṣṭabhedānnāmnorvyavasthāvatsaṃbhṛtyād iguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ śāṇḍilyādividyoktaguṇaviśiṣṭabrahmaṇaśca mitho bhedena rūpabhedātsaṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ nopasaṃhāra ityuktanyāyātideśatvādasya na saṃgatyādyapekṣā yathaikasminnudgīthe parovarīyastvādiguṇopāsterhiraṇyaśmaśrutvādyupāstirbhidyate tathaikasminnapi brahmaṇi vidyābhedopapatteḥ brahmapratyabhijñā na
GSP33brsgor3u:1543: 'puruṣo vāva yajñastasya yāni caturviśati varṣāṇi tatprātaḥ savanamatha yāni catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tanmādhyandinaṃ savanamatha yānyaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tattṛtīyaṃ savanam'iti prasiddhayajñasāmyārthaṃ savanatrayaṃ kalpitaṃ, 'sa yadaśiśiṣati yatpipāsati yanna ramate tā dīkṣā
GSP33brsgor3u:1544: atha yadaśnāti yatpibati yadramate tā upasadaḥ atha yaddhasati yajjakṣati yanmaithunaṃ carati tāni stutaśastrāṇi atha yattapodānādi sā dakṣiṇā maraṇamevāvabhṛthaḥ vasvādirūpā me prāṇā idaṃ savanatrayaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1553: iha tvasādhāraṇamaraṇāvabhṛthaguṇaviśiṣṭapuruṣayajñarūpaikyapratyabhidhānādvi dyaikyamiti pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntayati-nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1554: tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī śarīramidhmamuro vedirlomāni barhirvedaḥ śikhā hṛdayaṃ yūpaḥ kāma ājyaṃ manyuḥ paśustapo
GSP33brsgor3u:1555: 'gnirdamaḥ śamayitā dakṣiṇā vāgghotā prāṇa udgātā cakṣuradhvaryurmano
GSP33brsgor3u:1558: kiñca chāndogye tridhāvibhaktāyuṣi savanatvakalpanā, atra tu sāyaṅkālādāviti vairūpyamāha-yadapīti
GSP33brsgor3u:1559: yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtho yadramate tadupasada iti tittiriśrutau sārūpyamapi bhātītyata āha-yadapi kiñciditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1561: kiñca chāndogye puruṣayajñayoraikyaṃ śrutamatra tu bheda iti
GSP33brsgor3u:1563: yadyapi niṣādasthapatinyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ṣaṣṭhyoryuktaṃ tathāpyaprasiddhaikyakalpanāgauravādyajñasyātmeti bhedokterekasyaiva yajñatvayajamānatvavirodhādātmavido yo yajñaḥ prasiddhastasyeti vaiyadhikaraṇyameva yuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1564: kiñca vidvatsaṃbandhiyajñarūpaviśeṣyānuvādena vidvadaṅgairaṅgasaṃpadvidhāvekavākyatā pratīyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ viśeṣyasyāṅāgānāṃ ca pṛthagvidhivādinastava vākyabhedadoṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1565: kiñca satyādibhyo nyāsa evāpare ca yaditi saṃnyāsamuktvā sarvaiḥ sarvamidaṃ jagadityevaṃ tamātmānaṃ jñātvā bhūyo na mṛtyumupayāti vidvāniti saṃnyāsasādhyātmavidyāṃ purastātprājāpatyānuvāke upadiśyānantarānuvāke
GSP33brsgor3u:1567: taccheṣatayāyajñasaṃpattiḥ kriyate phalaikyaśruteḥ, chandogānāṃ tu svatantravidyāvidhirityāha-apica sasaṃnyāsāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1574: he devate, madripoḥ sarvamaṅgaṃ pravidhya vidāraya viśeṣataśca hṛdayaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1575: bhindhi dhamanīḥ śirāḥ pravṛñjaya troṭaya śiraścābhito nāśaya, evaṃ tridhā vipṛkto viśliṣṭo bhavatu me śatrurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1576: he deva savitaḥ, yajñaṃ tatpatiṃ ca prasuva nirvartayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1577: uccaiḥ śravāḥ śveto 'śvo yasyendrasya sa tvaṃ haritamaṇivannīlo
GSP33brsgor3u:1580: agniṣṭomo brahmaiva sa yasminnahani kriyate tadapi brahma tasmādya etadahaḥ sādhyaṃ karmopayantyanutiṣṭhinti te brahmaṇaiva sādhanena brahmopayanti te ca krameṇāmṛtatvamāpnuvantīti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1583: nanu teṣāṃ śeṣatve mānābhāvānnopasaṃhāra iti śaṅkate-nanveṣāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1587: aphalamantrādīnāṃ phalavaccheṣatvabodhanaṃ saṃnidherarthavattvaṃ tatsaṃbhave satyakasmādarthaśūnyatvenāsau saṃnidhirāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1588: nañpāṭhetvakasmāddhetuṃ vināsāvartho nāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1590: purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa pracarantīti vākyena pravargyasya kratuśeṣatvaṃ śrutaṃ, agniṣṭomādeśca tattadvākyena svargādyarthatvamato na
GSP33brsgor3u:1593: upāstiṣu mantraprayogaḥ kvāpi na dṛṣṭa ityata āha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1594: putrasya dīrghāyuṣyārthaṃ chāndogye trailokyasya keśātvenopāstiruktā tatra piturayaṃ prārthanāmantraḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1595: tatrāmuneti putrasya trirṇāma gṛhṇāti amunā putreṇa saha bhūritīmaṃ lokamamuṃ ca prapadye na me putraviyogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1596: tattadvākyenānyatra viniyuktānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃnidhinā vidyāsu viniyogo na virudhyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-vājapeya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1597: 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta'iti vākyena brahmavarcasaphale viniyuktasyāpi bṛhaspatisavasya 'vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta'iti
GSP33brsgor3u:1599: yadyapyekena vākyena prakaraṇāntarasthabṛhaspatisavasya pratyabhijñānamaṅgatvavidhānaṃ ca kartumayuktaṃ vākyabhedaprasaṅgādato māsāgnihotravatkarmāntarameva bṛhaspatisavākhyamaṅgatayā vidhīyata iti na viniyuktasya viniyoga iti bhaṭṭagurutantradvayasiddhaṃ, yathāpi yathā nityāgnihotrasyāśvamedhaprakaraṇe vāgyatasyaitāṃ rātrimagnihotraṃ juhotīti nāmnā pratyabhijñā, yathāvā darśapūrṇamāsavikṛtīṣṭāvājyabhāgau yajatītyekasminvākye prakṛtisthājyabhāgayoḥ padena pratyabhijñānaṃ vākyena vidhānaṃ tathātrāpi bṛhaspatisavapadena pratyabhijñānaṃ vākyenāṅgatāvidhānaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1600: naca sādhyabhāvārthavidhāyakākhyātaparatantraṃ nāmapadaṃ na siddhakarmapratyabhijñākṣamamiti vācyaṃ, siddhasyāpyaṅgatayā punaḥ sādhyatvasaṃbhave 'nyathāsiddhākhyātasyaiva
GSP33brsgor3u:1602: nacaivaṃ sati kuṇḍapāyisatre 'pyaṅgatvena nityāgnihotrasyaiva vidhiḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:1605: tasmādekasyaiva bṛhaspatināmakasya dhātvarthasya brahmavarcase viniyuktasyāpi vājapeyāṅgatayā viniyoga iti bhagavatpādatātparyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1606: astica viniyuktasya viniyoge sarvasaṃmatamudāharaṇaṃ khādiratvādikaṃ tasya kratau viniyuktasya vīryādiphale 'pi viniyogāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1607: tathā mantrakarmaṇāmanyatra viniyuktānāṃ vidyāśeṣatvamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-naiṣāmityādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:1610: 'deva savitaḥ prasuva'iti pradakṣiṇato 'gniṃ paryukṣediti vākyādagniparyukṣaṇe 'sāvitraṃ juhoti karmaṇaḥ purastātsavane savane
GSP33brsgor3u:1615: nanu liṅgādibharanyatra viniyuktānāmapi saṃnidhinā vidyāsvapi viniyogo
GSP33brsgor3u:1617: samavāye samānaviṣayatvena dvayorvirodhe, parasya daurbalyaṃ, kutaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1620: ayamāśayaḥ-ekatra viniyuktasya nirākāṅkṣatvādanyatra viniyogo viruddha eva parantu viniyojakapramāṇayoḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1621: 'nyataraviniyogatyāgāyogādagatyākāṅkṣotpādanena viniyuktaviniyogaḥ svīkriyate 'yathā khādiro yūpo bhavati''khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kuryāt'iti vākyābhyāṃ kratau viniyuktasya khādiratvasya vīryaphale viniyogaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1622: yatra tu pramāṇayoratulyatvaṃ tatra na svīkriyate prabalapramāṇena durbalaviniyogabādhāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1623: yathā 'kadācana starīrasi'ityasyā ṛca aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutyānyanirapekṣatayā gārhapatyopasthānaśeṣatvabodhikayendraprakāśanasāmārthyarūpaliṅgaprāptamindraśeṣatvaṃ bādhyate liṅgaṃ hi na sākṣāccheṣatvaṃ bodhayati kintvindraprakāśanamātraṃ karoti,
GSP33brsgor3u:1624: tena ca liṅgenānena mantreṇa indra upasthāpayitavya iti śrutiḥ kalpanīyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:1625: tayā śeṣatvabodha iti śrutivyavadhānena śeṣatvabodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ jhaṭiti svārthabodhakaśrutyā bādhyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1626: tathā liṅgena vākyaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā 'syo 'naṃ te sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā kalpayāmi', 'tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha
GSP33brsgor3u:1627: sumanasyamānaḥ'iti mantrābhāgayoḥ pratyekaṃ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca tatprakāśanasāmarthyaliṅgena śrutidvārā viniyoge sati pratītamekavākyatvaṃ bādhyate, tasya kṛtsne 'pi mantre sadanakaraṇaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ puro
GSP33brsgor3u:1628: 'ḍāśāsādanaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ ca liṅgaṃ kalpayitvā śrutikalpanayobhayatra kṛtsnamantraviniyogabodhane dvābhyāṃ liṅgaśrutibhyāṃ vyavadhānena śrutyekavyavahitakḷptaliṅgāddurbalatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1629: naca sāmarthyaṃ na kalpyamiti vācyaṃ, asamarthasya viniyogāyogāt ata eva gaṅgāpadasya tīrabodhaviniyoge lakṣaṇārūpaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1630: tathā vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā sāhnaprakaraṇāmnātadvādaśopasadāṃ dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyenāhīnāṅgatva bodhakena prakaraṇaprāptasāhnāṅgatvabādhādutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1631: pradhānasyāṅgākāṅkṣārūpaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tasyāṅgapradhānavākyaikavākyatāsāmarthyaśrutibhiḥ kalpyamānābhiḥ svārthaviniyogapramitau vyavadhānenāṅgasāmarthyaśrutyordvayoḥ kalpakavākyāddurbalatvāt tathā prakaraṇena saṃnidhirbādhyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1632: yathā rājasūyaprakaraṇena tadantargatābhiṣecanīyākhyasomayāgaviśeṣasaṃnidhipāṭhaprāptaṃ śunaḥ śepopākhyānāderabhiṣecanīyaśeṣatvaṃ bādhitvā kṛtsnarājasūyaśeṣatvamāpāditaṃ saṃnidheḥ prakaraṇādikalpakatvena
GSP33brsgor3u:1636: karmaṇe'iti mantra āmnātastatra samākhyābalenāsya mantrasya puroḍāśapātraśundhanaśeṣatvaṃ prāptaṃ saṃnidhinā bādhitvā sānnāyyapātraśundhanaśeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1639: evaṃ virodhe sati śrutirbādhikaiva samākhyā bādhyaiva, madhyasthānāṃ tu caturṇāṃ pūrvabādhyatvaṃ parabādhakatvaṃ ceti śrutiliṅgasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1640: tasmālliṅgādinānyatra viniyuktānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ durbalasaṃnidhinā na vidyāsu viniyoga iti siddham
GSP33brsgor3u:1642: karmaṇāṃ vidyopakāratve tābhiḥ sahaikaphalatve ca mānaṃ kiñcinnāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1644: nanu tarhi vedhādivākyānāmupaniṣadbhiḥ saha pāṭhasya kā
GSP33brsgor3u:1649: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam |
GSP33brsgor3u:1651: yathāśvo rajoyuktāni jīrṇaromāṇi tyaktvā nirmalo bhavati tathāhamapi pāpaṃ vidhūya kṛtātmā nirmalīkṛtacittaḥ san yathā vā rāhugrastaścandro rāhumukhātpramucya spaṣṭo bhavati tathā śarīraṃ dhūtvā tyaktvā dehābhimānānmuktaḥ sannakṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahmātmakaṃ lokaṃ abhi
GSP33brsgor3u:1653: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya nāmarūpe tyajanti tathā vidvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1654: tasya mṛtasya viduṣaḥ, dāyaṃ dhanaṃ, tattena vidyābalena sukṛtaduṣkṛte
GSP33brsgor3u:1658: yatra tu tyāga eva śrutaḥ tatra hānopāyanayoḥ sahabhāvasyāvaśyakatvānāvaśyakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1659: atra pūrvapakṣe stutiprakarṣāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1660: yadyapi tāṇḍyātharvaṇaśrutyornirguṇavidyārthayoḥ karmahānameva śrutaṃ nopāyanaṃ tathāpi kauṣītakiśrutau paryaṅkasthasaguṇabrahmavidyāyāmupāyanaṃ śrutamatropasaṃhartavyamityāśaṅkya vidyābhedānnopasaṃhāra ityāha-vidyāntareti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1661: kiñca yathā mantrakarmaṇāmanāvaśyakatvādvidyāsvanupasaṃhāra uktaḥ tathā parairupādānaṃ vināpi hānasaṃbhavenopādanasyānāvaśyakatvānna prāptiriti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā prāpte siddhāntayati-hānau tviyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1663: aśvaromadṛṣṭāntena vidhūtayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ paratrāvasthānasāpekṣatvātparairūpādānaṃ vācyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1664: vidyābhede guṇānupasaṃhāra iti vyavasthānuṣṭhānaviṣayā na stutiviṣayetyāha-yaducyata iti
GSP33brsgor3u:1668: nanvarthavādasya vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nārthavādāntareṇetyata āha-prasiddhā ceti
GSP33brsgor3u:1671: yajñasya puruṣarūpakalpanāyāṃ sendriyatvāya triṣṭubhau bhavata ityuktaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1676: vidvanniṣṭhayoreva tayoḥ phalaṃ pare prāpnuvanti vidyāsāmarthyādityupayantipadenocyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1681: naca yathā putrakṛtaśrāddhasya pitṛṣu phalaṃ tathātreti vācyaṃ, yasya phalamuddiśya yatkarma vihitaṃ tasya tatphalamiti nyāyena pitṛṇāṃ tṛptyuddeśena kṛtakarmaṇo vyadhikaraṇaphalatve 'pi viduṣaḥ karmakāle 'nuddiṣṭavyadhikaraṇaphalāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1682: kiñca viduṣo dehapāte karmaṇo 'sattvādyāvajjīvaṃ vidvatsevakasya taddveṣiṇo vā phalaṃ syādityata āha-nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1683: vidvatsevādveṣābhyāṃ vidvanniṣṭhapuṇyapāpatulye puṇyapāpe sevakadveṣiṇorjāyete jātayoḥ phalataḥ svīkāra upāyanamiti parihārasya sulabhatvādanāgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1685: upāyanavivakṣāyāmupāyanasyaivopasaṃhāraṃ sūtrakāro brūyādataḥ śabdasya taṃ brūvanstutiṃ sūcayatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1686: vidyāvicārātmake pāde stutivicārasya kā saṃgatirityata āha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1687: śākhāntarastho viśeṣaḥ śākhāntare 'pi grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-kuśeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1688: kuśā udgātṛṇāṃ stotragaṇanārthāḥ śalākā dārumayyaḥ, bho kuśāḥ, yūyaṃ vānaspatyāḥ vanasthamahāvṛkṣo vanaspatiḥ tatprabhavāḥ stha tā itthaṃbhūtā yūyaṃ mā pāta māṃ rakṣateti yajamānaprārthanā atra tā iti strīliṅganirdeśādaudumbarya iti bhāṣyācca śalākāsu kuśaśabdasya strītvaṃ mantavyaṃ darbhaviṣayasya na strītvaṃ, astrī kuśamityanuśāsanāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:1690: navākṣarāṇi chandāṃsi āsurāṇyanyāni daivāni teṣāṃ kvacchindobhiḥ stuvata ityatrāviśeṣaprāptau paiṅgivākyādviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1692: ātirātre ṣoḍaśino grahasyāṅgabhūtaṃ stotraṃ kadeti chandogādīnāmākāṅkṣāyāmudayasamayāviṣṭe sūrye ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotramityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1699: sāmānyaviśeṣayorekavākyatārūpāyāṃ gatau satyāṃ vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā nādhvaryuriti niṣedhādaviśeṣaśruteścādhvaryurupagāyati nopagāyati cetyevaṃ sarvatra vikalpo na yuktaḥ, vrīhiyavayostvagatyā vikalpa āśrita ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:1704: evaṃ vrīhivākyepi catvāro doṣā ityevaṃ duṣṭavikalpaparihārāya bhinnaśākhaśrutyorapyekavākyatā jaiminisaṃmatetyāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1706: juhuyāt'iti cānyatra śrutaṃ tatra yadi nadīkṣitavākyaṃ homapratiṣedhakaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:1707: syāttadā kratvarthatvānniṣedho 'nuṣṭheyaḥ, yāvajjīvavidhinā homo vānuṣṭheya iti vikalpaḥ syāt, sa cānyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1708: api tu yāvajjīvavākyaṃ prati nadīkṣitavākyasya śeṣatvānnakāra itaraparyudāsārthakaḥ syāddīkṣitānyalakṣakaḥ syāt, na homapratiṣedhakaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1710: atra bhagavatpādaiḥ sūtrameva paṭhitaṃ, miśraistu paryudāsādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'iti sthitamatrārthataḥ paṭhitamityuktaṃ taccintyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1711: sūtrārthastu yajñamātre yeyajāmahe iti prayoktavyamiti śrutaṃ, nānuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karotītyapi śrutaṃ, tatra nakārasya niṣedhakatve 'pyatirātre
GSP33brsgor3u:1712: ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇayorivānuyājeṣu yajñatvāviśeṣātprayoktavyaṃ niṣedhānna prayoktavyamiti vikalpaḥ syāt, tasyānyāyyatvāt yeyajāmahavidhereva nānuyājavākyamekadeśaḥ syāt, paryudāsavṛttyā vidhivākyaśeṣaḥ syāditi yāvat
GSP33brsgor3u:1713: tathā cānuyājabhinneṣu yāgeṣu yeyajāmaha iti prayoktavyamityekavākyateti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1718: vidhūnanasya hi phaladvayamaśvaromādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvasvabhāvāt cyutiranyatra saṃkrāntiśceti
GSP33brsgor3u:1720: tatra vidhūnanaśabdasya kampanaṃ mukhyārtha iti tāvatsarvasaṃmatam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1722: atastayoryaḥ svabhāvaḥ phaladātṛtvaśaktistataścālanaṃ vidyayā pratibandhāccyutiḥ sā lakṣaṇīyā na hāniramūrtayoranyatra saṃkrāntyayogādanyasāpekṣatvācceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1725: naca yatra dhunoterūpāyanaśabdasāṃnidhyaṃ tatra hānirlakṣyate na kevaladhunoterhāniścānyatra viduṣaḥ sevakādau tulyakarmasaṃkrāntiriti nāsaṃbhava iti vācyaṃ, kevaladhunoterapi mukhyārthāsaṃbhavenānyatra lakṣyatayā buddhisthahānilakṣaṇāyā eva yuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1726: upāyanasyāmukhyatvānna kvāpi hānilakṣaṇābījatvamiti śaṅkitvā puṇyapāpayoḥ phalataḥ svīkārātmakamupāyanaṃ hāniṃ vinānupapannaṃ sallakṣaṇānirṇāyakamiti pariharati-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1727: yathānyatraśrutamaudumbaratvādikaṃ kuśādinirṇāyakaṃ tathedamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatve niścāyakamityāha-kvacidapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1729: tathāpi hānaṃ kathaṃ lakṣyata ityāśaṅkya mukhyasaṃbandhādityāha-aśvaśceti
GSP33brsgor3u:1734: yadvā hānavācakamevāstu naca dhūñ kampana iti
GSP33brsgor3u:1736: śākhāntarasthamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvaniścāyakamityatra jaiminisūtraṃ taduktamiti gṛhītapūrvaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1737: evaṃ vidhṛnanasya hānitvisiddheḥ kevalahānāvupāyanopasaṃhāra iti siddham
GSP33brsgor3u:1743: pūrvoktaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvamupajīvya hānasya nadītaraṇānantaryaśruteraśvaiva romāṇi ityādau dehatyāgātprākkālatvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-tatkimiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1745: ityatra taditisarvanāmaśrutyāstenetyarthatayā saṃnihitanadītaraṇasya karmahānihetutvokterardhapathe karmakṣaya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1746: tatra vidyāyāḥ karmakṣayahetutvāsiddheḥ pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntayati-sāṃparāya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1748: saṃparetasya mṛtasya kañcitkālaṃ karmasattve phalābhāvāddevayānamārgapraveśāyogāccādāveva kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1755: kiñca mṛtasya chandato yathākāmaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānānupapatterubhyorvidyākarmakṣayayoḥ śruto hetuphalabhāvo virudhyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1756: kiñca sati puṣkalahetau na kāryavilamba iti nyāyopetatāṇḍyādiśrutivirodhastava syādasmatpakṣe
GSP33brsgor3u:1762: gaterarthavattvaṅkvacitsaguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgaḥ śrūyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ na śrūyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1763: tatra hānasaṃnidhau mārgasya śrutatvādanapekṣitatvācca saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-yathā tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1765: atra nirguṇavido 'pi muktyarthaṃ mārgāpekṣā pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte tvanapekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1771: nanu tarhi saguṇavidyāyāmapi mārgo vyartha ityata āha-upapanna iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1772: sā gatirlakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyārthasya sa tallakṣaṇārthaḥ //30//
GSP33brsgor3u:1777: atrāpyarcirādimārga eva viṣayastatra vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇādaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:1778: saguṇanirguṇavidyāsu mārgasya bhāvābhāvavyavasthāvatsaguṇāsvapi vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntena prāptau siddhānte vyavasthāpavādādgatiniyamo 'niyama ubhayatra phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1783: aviśeṣaśrutyādinā prakaraṇabādho na doṣa ityāha-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1784: tattatra adhikṛtānāṃ madhye ya itthaṃ pañcāgnīnvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate śraddhātapaupalakṣitaṃ brahma dhyāyanti te
GSP33brsgor3u:1789: tat brahmalokasthānaṃ, parāgatāḥ parāvṛttāḥ, kāmakrodhadoṣā na santīti
GSP33brsgor3u:1798: śukla gatirārcirādikā, kṛṣṇā dhūmādikā, jagato vidyākarmādhikṛtasya,
GSP33brsgor3u:1800: tatraikayā śuklayā punarāvṛttivarjaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gacchati anyayā svarge gatvā punarāyātītyarthaḥ
