GSP33brsgor3u:2069: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2072: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti
GSP33brsgor3u:2073: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ, tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ, 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2074: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2077: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2079: tasmāttattvābhedadṛṣṭyā vrataikyamiti sthitaṃ, saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2081: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2082: sarveṣāṃ devānāmābhimukhyena prāpyanhaviravadyati gṛhṇāti, acchaṃvaṭkāraṃ vaṣaṭkārākhyadevabhāgamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2083: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2084: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2085: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti
GSP33brsgor3u:2087: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:2088: anubrūhīti praiṣānantaramantraḥ puronuvākyeti bhedo 'sti, tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya, yā ca pūrvamanuvākya, sa paścādyājyeti vyatyāsamanvāheti śrutyā vidhānāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2091: vāśabdo 'vadhāraṇe, nānaiva devatā rājādiguṇabhedena bhedāvagamāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2093: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ, agnihotrasyeva dadhyādidravyabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2100: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi
GSP33brsgor3u:2103: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat, tathā vākprāṇādayo 'pi
GSP33brsgor3u:2105: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete 'gnayaḥ kratvarthā uta prādhānyajñāpakaliṅgādibhūyastvātpuruṣārthā veti saṃśayamāha-teṣviti kevalavidyātmakāḥ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vinā bhāvanāmayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2108: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brsgor3u:2110: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ, kriyāṅgasya yatkiñcitkaraṇena sidyadarśanādityāha-tadyaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2111: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti
GSP33brsgor3u:2119: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ saṃkalpamayatvākhyaprakārabhedopadeśaḥ kriyāgnivatsāṃkalpikāgnayo 'pyaṅgamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2120: kiṃ vidhivākyasthaṃ liṅgaṃ prakaraṇādbalīyaḥ, arthavādasthaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2125: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2130: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ, manasā rasatvena bhāvitamadhvaryurgṛhṇātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2131: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2132: grahaṇaṃ nāma somapātrasyopādānaṃ, gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2133: somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho
GSP33brsgor3u:2135: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno
GSP33brsgor3u:2138: kecittvatra bhāṣye daśarātraśabdo vikṛtiparaḥ, tatrāpi daśame 'hanyavivākyasaṃjñake mānasagrahasyātideśaprāptatayāṅgatvādityāhuḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2164: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2171: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ kratvarthatve 'ṅgānāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2173: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2176: grahāḥ pātrāṇi, astuvan, udgātāraḥ stuvanti, aśaṃsan hotāraḥ śaṃsanti, kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2182: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2183: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2189: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2194: tasyāṃ varṇabhedena prayogabhedaḥ, śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti āgneyaindrapuroḍāśayormadhye bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nidhāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2195: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca /
GSP33brsgor3u:2196: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brsgor3u:2197: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brsgor3u:2199: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā, anyathā prayogaikyāyogāt rājamātrakartṛkakratvantargateṣṭau tu varṇatrayasaṃyogābhāvānmadhye nidhānādiliṅgaṃ nāsti tataśca tantraikyasādhakābhāvāddakṣiṇābhedena tantrabheda ityaṅgānāmāvṛttireva caruṣviti sūtrārthaḥ atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2200: sa cotkarṣo yukta eva, rājamātrakartṛkarājasūyakratau varṇatrayakartṛkeṣṭerantarbhāvāyogāditi sthitaṃ, tathā manaścidādīnāmutkarṣa iti bhāvaḥ //50//
GSP33brsgor3u:2209: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:2210: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2211: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2212: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brsgor3u:2219: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2220: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2222: bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2230: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye
GSP33brsgor3u:2232: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ saṃghātajaṃ tadviśiṣṭasaṃghāta ātmetyāhurityanvyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2233: yathā mādakadravyeṣu tāmbūlapatrādiṣu pratyekamadṛṣṭāpi madaśaktistatsaṃghātājjāyate tadvadityārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2234: nanu dehaḥ svayaṃ na cetanaḥ ghaṭavadbhautikatvāt kintu cetanaḥ kaścitsvargādibhoktāsti tatsāṃnidhyāddehasya caitanyavibhrama ityata
GSP33brsgor3u:2239: manuṣyo 'haṃ jānāmiti dehasya jñātṛtāyāḥ pratyakṣatvādātmadharmatvena prasiddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dehānvyavyatirekānubhavāttadanyātmani pratyakṣābhāvādapratyakṣasyāprāmāṇikatvāddeha evātmeti prāpte sūtrasthanatvitipadena siddhāntaṃ pratijānīte-natvetaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2247: jñānatvāvacchinnaṃ tu nāstīti na jñānaṃ dehadharmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2249: kiñca dehavyatirike teṣāmabhāvasya saṃdigdhatvānna dehadharmatvaniścaya ityāha-apiceti
GSP33brsgor3u:2255: dehātmakabhūtānāṃ caitanyaṃ prati viṣayatvātkartṛkarmavirodhena viṣayasya kartṛtvā yogānna bhūtakartṛkatvaṃ caitanyasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2259: yā dehātiriktā sadrūpopalabdhiḥ sa evātmā cedanityaḥ syādupalabdheranityatvādityata āha-nityatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2260: ghaṭaḥ sphurati paṭaḥ sphuratīti sarvatra sphūrterabhedānnityatvaṃ viṣayoparāganāśe tu nāśabhrama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2270: ata eva tanvabhāve 'pi svapnavadyogināṃ bhogaṃ sūtrakṛdvakṣyati /
GSP33brsgor3u:2272: tasmāduktānumānugṛhītānmama śarīramiti bhedānubhāvādahaṃ manuṣya ityabhedajñānaṃ bhrama ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi
GSP33brsgor3u:2282: nanūdgīthādīnāṃ sarvaśākhāsvekatvādupāstayaḥ sarvatreti vedyaikyānniścaye kathaṃ saṃśaya ityata āha-pratiśākhaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2283: yathā dehātmanorbhedādātmadharmā dehe na saṃbhavanti tathā prativedamudgīthādīnāṃ bhinnatvādekasminvede vihitodgīthādyupāstayo vedāntarasthodgīthādiṣu na saṃbhavantīti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsgor3u:2286: sāmānyaśruteḥ saṃnihitavyaktigrahākhyasaṃkocastatra kartavyo yatra vyaktimātragraho nopapadyate, yathā śuklaṃ gāmānayetyatra gośruteḥ saṃnihitaśuklavyaktiparatayā saṃkocaḥ, atra nānupapattyabhāvādvyaktimātrasaṃbandhasāmānyamupāsyamiti siddhāntayati-evamityādinā //55//
GSP33brsgor3u:2290: pūrvaṃ śākhāntaravihitopāstīnāṃ śākhāntarasthāṅgasaṃbandhe yaḥ pratīto virodhastamaṅgīkṛtya saṃbandha uktaḥ, saṃprati virodha eva nāsti,
GSP33brsgor3u:2293: yajurvedināṃ kukkuṭo 'sīti mantro 'sti kuṭarurasīti nāsti tathāpi
GSP33brsgor3u:2299: phsamānatratulyakarmasthale hotavyā iti pañcatvaguṇavidhānādguṇinaḥ śākhāntaravihitāḥ saṃbadhyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2301: yajurvedināmagnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ śruto nāja iti jātiviśeṣastathāpi praiṣamantraliṅgājjātiviśeṣasaṃgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2304: tatheti 'sa janāsa indra'ityanenopalakṣitaṃ sūktaṃ sajanīyaṃ tasya
GSP33brsgor3u:2306: yo jāto bāla eva prathamo guṇaiḥ śroṣṭho manasvānvivekavānsa indra evaṃvidho he jānaso janā iti śrutyarthaḥ //56//
GSP33brsgor3u:2315: 'saiva hi satyādayaḥ'ityatra tadyattatsatyamiti prakṛtākarṣādvidyaikyamuktaṃ tadvadatraikyahetvabhāvādagatārthatvaṃ matvā pūrvatrodgīthādiśrutyā saṃnidhibādhenodgīthādyupāstīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2316: sarvaśākhāsūpasaṃhāravadvyastopāstīnāṃ vidhiśruteḥ phalaśravaṇasya ca samastopāstisaṃnidhiprāptaṃ stutyarthatvaṃ bādhitvā tadvidheyatvamiti pūrvapakṣamāha-pratyavayavamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2318: sutaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ somadravyaṃ tasyaiva prastutvamāsamantāt sutatvamavasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2320: ātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdheva sutejā iti vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ vyastopāstīnāṃ samastopāstyantarbhāvena prayājadarśavadekaprayogatve siddhe pradhānatadaṅgaphalānāmarthavādagatānāmekapradhānaphalatayopasaṃhārādvākyabhedo na yukta iti siddhāntyāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2323: vaktavyaḥ, sa ca na saṃbhavatītyāha-spaṣṭe ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2330: śāṇḍilyādibrahmavidyaikā nānā vā tathā saṃvargādi prāṇavidyaikā nānā veti rūpaikyabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā
GSP33brsgor3u:2336: siddhānte tu guṇānupasaṃhāra iti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-vedyābhede 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2342: atra sūtre śabdabhedo 'bhyuccayamātratayoktaḥ, vidyānānātve samyagghetavastvādipadopāttā guṇādaya eva /
GSP33brsgor3u:2347: tathā pratividyaṃ phalasaṃyogabhedāddaharaśāṇḍilyādisamākhyābhedādbheda iti samādhatte-naiṣa doṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2348: yaduktaṃ śrutinānātvaṃ guṇāntaravidhyarthamiti tannetyāha-na cātraika iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2351: kiñca vidyaikyapakṣe guṇānāṃ punaruktirvṛthā, naca pratyabhijñānārthā brahmaikyādeva tatsiddheḥ, vidyānānātvapakṣe tu guṇānāmaprāpteḥ sā
GSP33brsgor3u:2354: daharadhyātuḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati vaiśvānaradhyātā sarvatrānnamattītyādiphalabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2355: nanu vidyānānātve siddhe paścāddaharādividyā prativedāntamekānekā veti cintocitā tatkathamādau sā kṛtetyata āha-sthite ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2366: pūrvapakṣe yathecchamanuṣṭhānamityaniyamaḥ siddhānte vikalpenānuṣṭhānamiti niyama iti phalabhedaḥ tatrāniyamaṃ sādhayati-tatra sthitatvādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2367: ekapuroḍāśaphalatvādyathā vrīhiyavayorvikalpastathā vikalpaniyama evāsāṃ vidyānāṃ nyāyyaḥ, tulyaphalatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2368: naca phalabhūyastvārthinaḥ kāmyakarmasamuccayo 'pi dṛṣṭa iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor3u:2373: yasya puṃsaḥ, addhā īśvaro 'hamiti sākṣātkāraḥ syādvicikitsā ca nāsti ahamīśvaro na veti tasyaiveśvaraprāptirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2374: jīvanneva bhāvanayā devatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtya dehapātottarakālaṃ devānprāpnotīti śrutyantarārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2380: taṭasthopāstayo 'tra viṣayastāsu kiṃ vikalpa uta yathākāmamanuṣṭhānamiti pūrvavatsaṃśaye satyupāstitvāviśeṣādahaṅgrahavadvikalpa iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2382: sa yaḥ kaścidetaṃ vāyumevaṃ gotvena kalpitānāṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ vedopāste nāsau putramaraṇanimittaṃ rodanaṃ roditi labhate nityameva jīvatputro bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2389: yathā kratvanuṣṭhāne tadāśritāṅgānāṃ samuccityānuṣṭhānaniyamastathāṅgānuṣṭhāne tadāśritopāstīnāṃ tanniyama iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2391: aṅgānyanuṣṭhāpayanprayogavidhiryadyupāsanāni nānuṣṭhāpayettarhi teṣāṃ tadāśritatvaṃ vyarthamiti manvānasya śaṅketi bhāvaḥ //61//
GSP33brsgor3u:2398: godohanasya tu nānuṣṭhānaniyamaḥ, camasasthāne vihitatvāttanniyame camasavidhivaiyarthyāt
GSP33brsgor3u:2399: upāsanānāṃ tu na kasyacidaṅgasya sthāne vihitatvamiti samuccayaniyamo na virudhyata iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2407: svarādipramādādduṣṭamapyudgīthaṃ samyakkṛtāddhotṛśaṃsanādanusamāhāratyeva nirdeṣaṃ karotyeva kila, śaṃsyamānapraṇavena svīyodgīthasyaikyadhyānabalādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2409: sāmavedasthodgīthadhyānasya ṛgvedoktapraṇavasaṃbandho yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa evāṅgānāṃ sarvavedāntavihitopāstisamuccaye liṅgaṃ praṇavarūpapadārthasyopāstīnāṃ ca vedāntaroktatvasādṛśyādvedāntaroktāṅgasaṃbandhasyāpi samānatvādityarthaḥ //63//
GSP33brsgor3u:2413: oṅkārasya dhyeyasya sādhāraṇyādapi tadāśritadhyānānāṃ samuccityānuṣṭhānaṃ gamyata iti liṅgāntaramāha-guṇeti
GSP33brsgor3u:2414: tenoṅkāreṇa, vedatrayoktaṃ karma pravartata ityarthaḥ anvayamukhenoktamevārthaṃ vyatirekato 'pi vyācaṣṭe-athaveti //64//
GSP33brsgor3u:2418: phalecchāyā aniyamādupāstyaniyama eva yuktaḥ, aṅgatsamuccayaniyame mānābhāvāditi siddhāntayati-na veti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2419: prayogavidhiḥ khalu sāṅgapradhānānuṣṭhānaniyāmako na tvanaṅgānāṃ saṃgrahaka ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2423: samāhārādguṇasādhāraṇyaśruteścetyuktaṃ liṅgadvayamapi mānāntaraprāptasya dyotakaṃ na svayaṃ sādhakamarthavādasthatvādityāha-paraṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2426: idameva teṣāṃ aṅgāśritatvaṃ yadaṅgābhāve satyasattvaṃ na tvaṅgavyāpakatvamityarthaḥ //65//
GSP33brsgor3u:2430: kiñca viduṣā brahmaṇānyeṣāmṛtvijāṃ pālyatvavacanānna sarvopāstīnāṃ sahaprayoga ityāha-darśanācceti
GSP33brsgor3u:2433: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor3u:2440: pūrvapāde parāparavidyānāṃ guṇopasaṃhāroktyā svarūpaṃ niścitamasminpāde tāsāṃ karmānaṅgatayā puruṣārthahetutvaṃ nirūpyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2441: tato 'ṅgākāṅkṣāyāṃ yajñādīni bahiraṅgāni śamāddīnyantaraṅgāni ca nirūpyanta ityekavidyāviṣayatvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃgatiḥ tatrādau tattvajñānaṃ viṣayīkṛtya vādivipratipattyā saṃśayamāha-atheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2453: aṅgiphalenāṅgabhūta ātmāvagataprayojanastadāśraye tatsaṃskāre jñāne phalaśrutirarthavāda ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2454: parṇamayī dravyaṃ, yajamānasyāñjanaṃ saṃskāraḥ, prayājādīni karmāṇi teṣvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2456: ātmajñānaṃ na karmāṅgaṃ mānābhāvāditi siddhāntī śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2458: yukto hyanārabhyādhītāyāḥ parṇatāyā juhūdvāreṇa vākyātkratvaṅgabhāvo juhvāḥ kratuvyāpyatayā kratūpasthāpakatvāt, na tathātmavijñānasya 'ātmā
GSP33brsgor3u:2459: draṣṭavyaḥ'iti vākyātkratusaṃbandha upapadyate, ātmanaḥ kratuvyāptyabhāvāditi siddhāntī dūṣayati-neti
GSP33brsgor3u:2466: yasyārthe jāyādikaṃ priyaṃ bhogyaṃ sa ātmā draṣṭavya iti bhogyaliṅgena sūcitabhoktṛbhinnamakartṛsvarūpaṃ nāstīti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2467: janmādisūtramārabhya sādhitaṃ svarūpaṃ kathaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2468: svarūpajñānaṃ vedāntānāṃ phalaṃ, tasya kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavicāreṇa dārḍhyaṃ kriyata ityāha-satyamiti //2//
GSP33brsgor3u:2475: he bhagavanta iti brāhmaṇānsaṃbodhya brahmavitkaikeyarājo brūte ahaṃ yakṣyamāṇo yāgaṃ kariṣyamāṇo 'smi vasantvatra bhagavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2477: alpāyāsaṃ mukterūpāyaṃ jñānaṃ labdhvā bahvāyāsaṃ karma na kuryurityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-akva iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2488: taṃ paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ vidyākarmaṇī anugacchata ityarthaḥ //5//
GSP33brsgor3u:2492: guroḥ śuśrūṣārūpaṃ karma kurvannatiśeṣeṇāvaśiṣṭena kālena yathāvidhānaṃ vedamadhītyānantaramācāryasya kulādgṛhāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2494: abhisamāvartanaṃ kṛtvā kuṭumbe gārhasthye sthitaḥ pratyahaṃ śucau deśe svādhyāyādhyayanaṃ kurvannanyāṃśca nityādidharmānanutiṣṭhanbrahmalokaṃ prāpnotīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2498: tataśca brahmāpi vedārtha iti tadavabedhavataḥ karmavidhānamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2503: iha dehe karmāṇi kurvanneva śataṃ saṃvatsarāñjīvitumicchedevaṃ karmitvena jīvati tvayi nare karma pāpaṃ na lipyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2511: asya mahata iti vākyaśeṣātpriyasaṃsūcita ātmā para eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2513: tathākṣipuruṣo 'pyavasthāsākṣi parañjyotiriti vākyaśeṣātpara iti vibhāgaḥ jīvānukarṣaṇamabhedābhiprāyamityaṅgīkāre na virodha iti katham, abhede jīvatvavirodhādityata āha-pārameśvaramiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2514: jñānaṃ karmāṅgamaphalatve sati karmaśeṣāśrayatvādityukto heturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:2519: brahmavidāṃ karmavatsaṃnyāsasyāpi darśanātteṣāṃ karmadarśanātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ lokasaṃgrahārthatvenānyathāsiddhamityāha-tulyaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2520: kiñca yasya karma sa na brahmavidityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2522: brahmavidāṃ lokasaṃgrahārthaṃ kriyamāṇamapi karma na bhavati abhimānābhāvenānadhikāritvāditi bhāvaḥ //9 // //10//
GSP33brsgor3u:2526: samanvārambhavacanasya mumukṣuviṣayatvamaṅgīkṛtya vidyā anyaṃ mumukṣuṃ muktatvenānvārabhata iti vibhāga uktaḥ sūtrakṛtāḥ vastutastu
GSP33brsgor3u:2528: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye taṃ vidyetyādivākye yathāprāptānuvādini vidyādipadārthamāha-tatreti
GSP33brsgor3u:2536: mātrapadamātmajñānasya vyāvartakaṃ na karmajñānasyetyāha-naiṣa doṣa iti //12 // //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:2542: evaṃ karma kurvityapi tvayi nare neto vidyālabdhādbrahmabhāvādanyathāsti karmaṇā saṃsāro nāstīti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2549: tadetadbrahma yeṣāṃ no 'smākaṃ ayamaparokṣa ātmā ayameva lokaḥ puruṣārthaste vayaṃ kiṃ prajādinā kariṣyāma ityālocya karma tyaktavanta
GSP33brsgor3u:2551: nanvayaṃ loka iti jñānaphalasya pratyakṣatvoktirayuktā karmaphalavadadṛṣṭatvādityata āha-anubhaveti
GSP33brsgor3u:2562: trayo dharmaskandhāḥ karmapradhānā āśramāścaturtho brahmasaṃstha ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2563: 'brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya eva vā
GSP33brsgor3u:2566: anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ'iti smṛteśca prāptagārhasthyasyaiva nirastarṇatrayasya pārivrājyamityapi śaṅkā na kāryā
GSP33brsgor3u:2573: ūrdhvaretaḥ śabditaṃ pārivrājyamanuṣṭheyaṃ na veti mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe bhrāntimūlatvānnānuṣṭheyamityāha-traya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2578: yastu vedasya grahaṇāntaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carati sa brāhmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2579: ṛtukāle svadāragāmī nityaṃ parastrīvimukhaḥ prājāpatyaḥ, saṃvatsaraṃ vedavratakṛdvaṭurvā prājāpatyaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2581: gṛhastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vārtāko yāyāvaraḥ śālīno ghorasaṃnyasikaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2585: uddhṛtaparipūtābhiradbhiḥ kāryaṃ kurvanpratyahaṃ kṛtoñchavṛttirgrāmavāsī ghorasaṃnyasika ityucyate, hiṃsāvimukhatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2586: vānaprastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vaikhānasa audumbaro vālakhilyaḥ phenapaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2588: yastu prātaruthāya yāṃ diśaṃ paśyati tatratyaudumbarabadarīnīvāraśyāmākaiḥ karmaparaḥ sa audumbaraḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2589: yastu jaṭāvalkaladhārī aṣṭau prātasānvṛttyupārjanaṃ kṛtvā cāturmāsye saṃgṛhītāśī kārtikyāṃ saṃgṛhītapuṣpaphalatyāgī sa vālakhilyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2590: phenapāstu śīrṇaparṇaphalavṛttayo yatra kvacidvasantaḥ karmaparā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2591: tathā parivrājākāścaturvidhāḥ kuṭīcakā bahūdakā haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2593: bahūdakāstu tridaṇḍinaḥ śikyajalapavitrapādukāsanaśikhāyajñopavītakaupīnakāṣāyaveṣadhārāstīrthānyaṭanto bhaikṣaṃ caranta ātmānaṃ prārthayante /
GSP33brsgor3u:2594: haṃsāstu ekadaṇḍinaḥ śikhāvarjaṃ yajñopavītadharāḥ śikyakamaṇḍalupāṇayaḥ grāmaikarātravāsinaḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇaparāḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2595: paramahaṃsāstvekadaṇḍadharā muṇḍā ayajñopavītinaḥ tyaktasarvakarmāṇa ātmaniṣṭhā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2596: atra pūrvapakṣe saṃnyāsābhāvāñjñānasya svatantraphalatvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tadbhāvāttatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2597: skandhā āśramāḥ ātmānaṃ śarīramācāryasya kule gṛhe karśayannaiṣṭhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2598: skandhaśrutāvāśramā na vidhīyante kintu brahmasaṃsthatāsturthamanūdyanta ityukte śaṅkate-nanu parāmarśe 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2600: pratyakṣā skandhaśrutireva purovādo 'stu nānuvāda ityata āha-smṛtīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2603: asyā anuvādatve tu mūlatvena sāgnikānagnikāśramaśrutistatra vidhiśceti dvayakalpanāgauravādityata āha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2614: ātmaloko mahīyān yadarthamaśakyāṃ pravrajyāmapi kurvantīti stutirvartamānāpadeśādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2622: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmupavītaṃ devānāmiti vākye daive karmaṇyupavītaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33brsgor3u:2624: mānuṣakriyāsu dehārdhavastrabandhanākhyanivītasya saukaryārtatayā prāptatvāt pitrye karmaṇi prācīnāvītasyāpi vidhyantaraprāptatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2640: idānīṃ vidhitvaṃ tasyā eva kalpyaṃ lāghavādityāha-vidhirveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2647: mahāpitṛyajñe pretāgnihotre ca sruci prakṣiptaṃ havirāhavanīyaṃ prati yadā nīyate tasya haviṣaḥ 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravet'iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2648: vihitādhodhāraṇastāvakatayopari hītyasyaikavākyatvabhāne 'pi daive home srugdaṇḍopari samiddhāraṇe vidhirevāpūrvatvāditi vākyabhedastṛtīyādhyāye jaiminyācāryeṇokta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2649: evaṃ catvāra āśramā vidhīyanta iti pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2653: nanu traya iti vākya āśramacatuṣṭayasyāprāpternirbījo 'yaṃ vicāra ityāśaṅkya tadvākye parivrājakaḥ parāmṛṣṭo na veti saṃdihyādye pūrvapakṣaprāptimāha-yadiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2654: nanvanāśramyeva brahmasaṃsthaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-anāśramitveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2658: vanasthasya hyasādhāraṇaṃ kṛcchrādikaṃ tapa iti prasiddham /
GSP33brsgor3u:2661: sa ca stutisāmarthyāt saha brahmasaṃsthayā vidhīyata iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2663: pṛthagvyapadeśācca brahmasaṃsthaḥ pūrvoktebhya āśramibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2665: kālabhedenāpi sati mandaprajñatve prajñādhikyavatsati karmitve teṣāṃ vikṣiptacetasāṃ brahmasaṃsthānupapatteḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2666: karmatyāge ca parivrāḍeva brahmasaṃstha ityasmadiṣṭasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2668: yadyapi brahmasaṃsthaśabdaḥ saṃnyāsāśrame na rūḍhastathāpi yogāttamevopasthāpayati /
GSP33brsgor3u:2672: nyāsaḥ saṃnyāso brahmeti stutau hetumāha-brahmā hīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2673: hiraṇyagarbho hi para iti prasiddhaḥ ato brahmatvena stutaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ para eveti stutvā karmāṇi nindati tānīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2674: tato nyāsa eva jñānadvārā mocakatvādadhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2675: tadbuddhaye brahmacittāstadātmāno brahmasvarūpāstanniṣṭhāḥ śravaṇādiparāstatparāyaṇāḥ brahmaprepsavaḥ niṣkāmā iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2688: sakalāṅgānameva kathañcitkarmānadhikṛtānāṃ saṃnyāso yuktaḥ vikalāṅgānāṃ tvandhādīnāṃ na jñānapradhānasaṃnyāsādhikāra ityāha-brahmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2704: yathānuṣṭheyagārhasthyasāmyaśruteḥ pārivrājyasyānuṣṭheyatvaṃ tadvadāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ juhvādistutiśrutisāmyātstutitvamiti pūrvapakṣayati-stutyarthā iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2711: pūrvapakṣe svananuṣṭhānaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvanuṣṭhānaṃ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2718: kiñcātra vidhikalpya iti kṛtvācintayoktaṃ vastutastu na kalpyaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2722: devo madiṣṭaṃ kuryāditi prārthanādāvapi liṅgādiprayogādupāsītetyādiśabdānāṃ kathaṃ vidhiparatvaniścaya ityata āha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2726: naca śloke pañcamamityukteḥ pañcapadānāmeva vidhilakṣaṇatvaṃ nopāsītetyādīnāmiti bhramitavyam
GSP33brsgor3u:2727: kriyāsāmānyavācināṃ kṛbhvastīnāmudāharaṇena sarvadhātūparaktaliṅādīnāṃ vidhilakṣaṇatvasya vivakṣitatvātpañcamapadaṃ tūktāpekṣayā ślokapūraṇārthaṃ mṛtyurdhāvati pañcama itivat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2728: yadyapi ḍukṛñ karaṇa iti dhātereva karaṇaśabditabhāvanākhyakriyāsāmānyavācitvaṃ netarayordhātvorbhū sattāyāmas bhuvītyarthāntarokteḥ tathāpi janmākhyabhavanasya tatphalasyāstitvasya ca prayojyaniṣṭhasya prayojakavyāpārātmakabhāvanāvyāptatvāttayoḥ kriyāsāmānyavācitvavyavahāraḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2729: tatra kuryāditi prakṛtyarthabhāvanākhyātenānūdyate yathā dvāviti prayoge prakṛtyartho dvitvaṃ pratyayenānūdyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2734: ākhyātānāṃ kartrādikārake śaktya bhāvātkartṛkarmaṇorākṣepa eveti mīmāṃsakamatam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2737: tathā daṇḍī bhavet bhūyate daṇḍinā bhavitavyamityudāhartavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2741: dhātūnāṃ pratyayānāṃ kartrādikārakāṇāṃ ca bhede 'pi vidhibhedo nāstīti jñāpanārthaṃ pratidhātūdāharaṇatrayaṃ darśitamiti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2742: evaṃ sūtre bhāvo vidhiriti vyākhyāya caśabdātphalamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:2744: eṣa ṛtvigupāsakaḥ kāmāgānasya gānena phalasaṃpādanasyeṣṭe samartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2745: evamaṅgāśritavidyā api svatantraphalāḥ kimu vaktavyamanaṅgātmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2751: aśvamedhe putrādiparivṛtāya rājñe pāriplavamācakṣīteti nānāvidhākhyānakathanātmakaḥ pāriplavaprayogo vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2754: tathaiva kathānāṃ na vidyāstāvakatvaṃ pāriplavānuṣṭhānalābhāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2756: yathā devasya tvā saviturityādimantre kasyacitpadasya prayogasamavetārthatayā śeṣasya prayogāṅgatvaṃ tathā vedāntasthakathānāṃ prayogaśeṣatvam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2758: kathānāṃ guruśiṣyasamācārapradarśanena buddhisaukaryadvārā saṃnihitavidyāśeṣatvaṃ sāmardhyaliṅgādato vidyāprādhānyamiti phalaṃ matvā siddhāntayati-tannetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2759: aśvamedhe prathama'hani manurvaivasvata iti kathāṃ brūyāddvitīye 'hani
GSP33brsgor3u:2760: yamo vaivasvata iti tṛtīye 'hani varuṇa āditya iti vākyaśeṣe kathānāṃ viśiṣyoktatvādupakramasya saṃkoco yukta iti bhāvaḥ //23//
GSP33brsgor3u:2765: prarocanaṃ prītijananaṃ sa prajāpatirvapāmudakhidat homāyoddhṛtavānityasya prājāpatyamajaṃ tūparamālabheteti vidhiśeṣatve evamanyeṣāṃ tattadvidhiśeṣatvaṃ draṣṭavyam //24//
GSP33brsgor3u:2769: evamādyādhikaraṇaprameyaṃ vidyāsvātantryamadhikaraṇatrayeṇa dṛḍhīkṛtyādyādhikaraṇasya phalamāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2770: brahmavidyā svaphale mokṣe janayitavye sahakāritvena karmāṇyapekṣate na veti vādivivādātsaṃśaye tenaiti brahmavitpuṇyakṛttaijasa ityādiśrutyā jñānakarmasamuccayena mokṣaprāptikathanādapekṣata iti prāpte vidyāyā muktihetutvādavidyānivṛttyākhyamuktau na karmāpekṣeti
GSP33brsgor3u:2773: puṇyakṛttaijasaḥ śuddhasatve brahmavidbhūtvā tena vedanenaiti brahma prāpnotīti śrutirvyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2774: muktāveva karmaṇāmasāmarthyādanapekṣā vidyāyāṃ tvasti cittaśuddhidvārā teṣāmapekṣetyadhikaṃ vaktumayamupasaṃhāra ityupasaṃhārasūtrasya
GSP33brsgor3u:2780: yathā pramāphalatvādavidyānivṛttau karmānapekṣā tathā pramātvādvidyāyāmapi pramākaraṇamātrasādhyāyāṃ nāsti karmāpekṣeti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2783: atra vividiṣāyāmiṣyamāṇajñāne vā yajñādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ hetutvamapūrvatvādvidhīyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2790: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2791: 'avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtamaśnute'ityādiśrutyā karmaṇā pāpanivṛttau jñānena muktyabhidhānācceti siddhāntayati-idamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2792: nanvatra vividiṣantīti pañcamalakāreṇa vividiṣāṃ bhāvayeyuriti sanarthecchaiva bhāvyatayā bhāti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2793: tāṃ viṣayasaundaryalabhyatayollaṅghya vedanaṃ cedbhāvyamucyate tarhi vedanamapyullaṅghya tatphalaṃ mokṣa eva karmabhirbhāvyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vividiṣāsaṃyogācceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2794: iṣyamāṇatayā vidyāyāḥ śabdataḥ phalatvabhānādaśrutamokṣo na phalamanyathā kāṣṭhaiḥ pacatītyatrāpi kāṣṭhānāṃ pākaphalatṛptihetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2797: kaścittu jñānārthakarmadvāreti matvā sarve vedāntā ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2801: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt |
GSP33brsgor3u:2806: śamāderāvaśyakatvānna śabdamātralabhyā vidyetyarthaḥ yasmādevaṃvinna lipyate karmaṇā pāpakena tasmādeva vidyārthī śamādyupeto bhūtvā vicārayediti vidhirgamyata ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2807: atroparatapadena saṃnyāsa uktastasya śravaṇāṅgatvamate śamādiviśiṣṭaśravaṇamatra vidhīyate
GSP33brsgor3u:2809: śrutismṛtiṣu phalavattvenotpannasaṃnyāsasyāṅgatvāyogāt, śrotavya iti vihitaśravaṇānuvādenānekaśamādividhāne vākyabhedāpātāt, paśyediti ca prakṛtyā śravaṇalakṣaṇādoṣācca saṃnyāso na śravaṇasyāṅgaṃ kintu tataḥ prāganuṣṭhoyatve 'pi śravaṇavajjñānārtha iti mataṃ tadā śamādisamuccayena jñānaṃ bhāvayediti jñānārthaṃ śamādisamuccayavidhirityanavadyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2810: yaḥ pūrvaṃ yajñādiśruteḥ stutyarthatvāṅgīkāraḥ āpātato guḍajihvikānyāyena śamādisvīkārārthaṃ kṛtastamidānīṃ tyajati-yajñādīnyapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2816: tatra pūṣā devatā piṣṭabhāgo vā darśapūrmamāsayornāsti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2817: ataḥ samāsātpratītasya kālatrayānavamṛṣṭasya dravyadevatāsaṃbandhasyāvinābhāvena yāgavidhyupasthāpakatvāt prayogajñānāya vidhipadamadhyāhṛtya prakaraṇādutkarṣeṇa pūṣoddeśena piṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti vikṛtau saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2820: karmaṇāṃ jñānahetutve śamādivadyāvajjñānodayamanuvṛttiḥ syāttathāca saṃnyāsābhāva ityata āha-tatrāpīti
GSP33brsgor3u:2821: dṛṣṭavikṣepanivṛttidvārā śamādīnāṃ śānārthatvādanuvṛttirna karmaṇāmadṛṣṭadvārā jñānārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ //27//
GSP33brsgor3u:2830: atra bhakṣyābhakṣyaniyamatyāgasya vidyāṅgatvasiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tu vidyāstutiriti vivekaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2832: yathā grāmyakarmaṇi vāmadevyasāmopāsakavyatiriktaviṣayaṃ parastrīniṣedhaśāstraṃ tadvaditi prāpte siddhāntaṃ sūtrādbahireva darśayati-nedamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2833: prāṇavidyāvidhisaṃnidheraśakyatvācca stutireva na vidhiḥ kalpyaḥ niṣedhaśāstravirodhāt kḷpto hi vidhiḥ sāmānyaśāstrabādhako natu kalpya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2834: svasthasya prāṇavido na sarvānnānumatirityatra liṅgaṃ vadan sūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2836: maṭacyo raktakṣudrapakṣiṇastairhateṣu kurudeśasthasasyeṣu durbhikṣe jāte bālayā saha jāyayā munirdeśāntaraṃ gacchannibhyāgrāme sthitavānibhyo hastipālakastena sāmikhāditānardhabhakṣitān kutsitamāṣān yācayitvā bhakṣitavān /
GSP33brsgor3u:2837: ibhvena jalaṃ gṛhāṇetyukte satyucchiṣṭaṃ vai me pītaṃ syāditi pratiṣidhya māṣāḥ kiṃ nocchiṣṭā itībhyenokte sati māṣabhakṣaṇe jalatyāge ca kāraṇamuvāca /
GSP33brsgor3u:2839: jalapānaṃ tu svecchātastaḍāgādau labhyata iti māṣān khāditvāvaśiṣṭāñjāyāyai dattavān /
GSP33brsgor3u:2840: sā cānāpadgatā patyurāpadaṃ jñātvā māṣānsaṃrakṣya prātastasmai dadau /
GSP33brsgor3u:2841: sa ca tān khāditvā rājño yajñaṃ gatvā prastotrādīnākṣipya prāṇādikāṃ prāstāvādidevatāmupadīśya dhanaṃ prāpya sthita iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2842: atrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇajalatyāgātmakaśiṣṭācāraliṅgācchrautādanāpadi viduṣāpyabhakṣyaṃ na bhakṣaṇīyamiti sūcyata iti bhāvaḥ //28 // //29//
GSP33brsgor3u:2846: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2855: kāmakāro yatheṣṭapravṛttiḥ so 'pi niṣedho 'pi upapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:2857: yadyayamapi vidhiḥ syāttarhi vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavatsurāpāne vikalpaḥ syātsa ca sarvasmṛtibhiḥ śiṣṭācāreṇa ca viruddha iti tātparyārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brsgor3u:2862: nityāgnihotrādikarmasu vihitatvādviniyuktaviniyogavirodhācca saṃśaye śāstrāntaravirodhātsarvānnatvokteḥ stutitvavannityaviniyuktatvaśrutivirodhādvividiṣāyāṃ viniyogaśruteḥ stutitvamiti pūrvapakṣamāha-tatreti jñānakāmanayānuṣṭhāne karmaṇāmanityatvamanāvaśyakatvam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2863: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brsgor3u:2868: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2872: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2874: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2877: yathā 'khādiro yūpo bhavati'iti śrutyā khādiratvasya kratvarthatā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti śrutyā puruṣārthatā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2878: ataḥ sati vākyadvaye viniyuktaviniyogo na virudhyata ityarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor3u:2882: nanu nityāgnihotrādibhyo bhinnā evāpūyarvajñādayo vividiṣāyāṃ viniyujyantāṃ tatra kuto viniyuktaviniyogastatrāha-sarvathāpīti
GSP33brsgor3u:2884: kuṇḍapāyināmayane māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatītyākhyātasya sādhyahomavācitvāttadekārthakāgnihotrapadasya vyavahitasiddhāgnihotraparāmarśakatvāyogānmāsaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ karmāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti yuktamiha tu yajñenetyādi subantānāmākhyātenaikārthatvābhāvātsiddhavyavahitakarmānuvādakatvātteṣāmeva karmaṇāṃ jñānārthatvavidhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2885: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:2896: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2902: raikvādīnāṃ vidyāvattvaliṅgasya janmāntarāśramakarmaṇānyathāsiddheranāśramakarmaṇo vidyārthatvaprāpakaṃ mānāntaraṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate-nanu liṅgamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2906: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2908: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsgor3u:2914: atra puṇyakṛttvaliṅgādāśramitvaṃ jyāyaḥ puṇyopacaye śīghraṃ vidyālābhādanāśramasya ninditatvācceti bhāvaḥ //39//
GSP33brsgor3u:2917: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ |
GSP33brsgor3u:2919: uttamāśramātpūrvāśramaṃ prāptasya pracyutasya karmāpi vidyāheturanāśramikarmavaditi saṃgatiḥ, pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ caitat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2920: siddhānte tu bhraṣṭasya karma na heturiti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2921: rāgādiprābalyātpracyutiniṣedhācca pracyutiḥ prāmāṇikī na veti saṃśayamāhaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2925: tadiyādgacchediti padaṃ śāstramārgastatastasmātpārivrājyānna punareyānna pracyavediti uniṣadrahasyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2928: 'caṇḍālāḥ pratyavasitāḥ'iti smṛteśca patitānāṃ karma niṣphalamiti bhāvaḥ //40//
GSP33brsgor3u:2935: atra pracyutasya prāyaścittaṃ syānnaveti upapātakatvātpatanasmṛteśca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2936: pracyutasya yajñādikaṃ niṣphalamityuktaṃ tadvatprāyaścittamāpi niṣphalamiti pūrvapakṣayati-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2937: atra kṛtaprāyaścittasya karma jñānaheturna bhavatīti phalaṃ siddhānte tu bhavatītidaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2939: dārasaṃbandhottarakālavihitādhānasya saṃpratyaprāptakālatvenāhavanīyābhāvāttadvadavakīrṇino brahmacāriṇaḥ prāyaścittapaśurgardabho laukikāgnau hotavya ityadhikāralakṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhādhyāye nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati END BsRp_3,4.11.41
GSP33brsgor3u:2941: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam |
GSP33brsgor3u:2944: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva
GSP33brsgor3u:2947: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2949: ataḥ kasya caruḥ kārya iti saṃdehe vṛddhaprayogasāmyātsamā tulyā vikalpena pratipattiḥ syāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ-śāstramūlā pratipattirgrāhyā śāstranimittatvāddharmādijñānasya /
GSP33brsgor3u:2950: tathāca 'yadānyā oṣadhayo mlāyantyathaite yavā modamānāstiṣṭhanti, iti śāstramūlatvāddīrghaśūkaprayogasyaivādara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2952: brahmacaryarakṣārthaṃ yatnādhikyaṃ kāryamiti jñāpanārthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ spaṣṭamapi na paśyāmītyuktaṃ bhagavadatriṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2954: kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyaṃ mahākakṣaṃ bahutṛṇakāṣṭhadeśaṃ jaladānādinā vardhayeta /
GSP33brsgor3u:2970: kṛtaprāyaścittaistaiḥ saha kṛtaśravaṇādikaṃ jñānasādhanaṃ na veti saṃdehe teṣāṃ śuddhatvātsādhanamiti prāpte prāyaścittātparaloke teṣāṃ śuddhatve
GSP33brsgor3u:2978: yaḥ kṛtaprāyaścittaḥ sa saṃvyavahārya ityutsargasya nindātiśayasmṛtyā naiṣṭhikādiṣu bādhavadyo yadaṅgakartā sa tadāśritasya kartetyutsargasya kartuḥ phalaśrutyā bādha iti pūrvapakṣamāha-kimiti atra kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvaṅgāśritā ṛtvikkartṛkā apyupāstayo yajamānagāmisvatantraphalāḥ kimu vācyaṃ svaniṣṭhabrahmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti phalaṃ vivektavyam ataḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ hiṅkāraprastāvodgīthapratihāranidhanākhyapañcaprakāre sāmni vṛṣṭidhyāturvarṣasamṛddhiḥ phalamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2979: śrutaṃ phalaṃ ṛtviggataṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tacceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2981: astu tasya phalaṃ tadgataṃ kartātvanyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-phalaṃ ceti
GSP33brsgor3u:2988: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate |
GSP33brsgor3u:2991: tamudgīthākhyaṃ praṇavaṃ prāṇadṛṣṭyā dhyātavāndhyātvā ca naimiśīyānāṃ satriṇāmudgātāsīdityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2994: krayaṇadvārā kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ copapadyate bhṛtyakartṛke yuddhe rājā yudhyate jayati cetivaditi bhāvaḥ //45 // //46//
GSP33brsgor3u:2999: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3000: pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya niścayena labdhvā bālyena śravaṇajajñānasya balabhāvena mananenāsaṃbhāvanānirāsena bālasya bhāvena vā śuddhacittatvena sthātumicchedevaṃ mananaśravaṇe kṛtvādānantaraṃ munirnididhyāsanakṛtsyādevamamaunaṃ ca maunādanyadbālyapāṇḍityadvayaṃ maunaṃ ca nididhyāsanaṃ labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3001: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3002: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na
GSP33brsgor3u:3005: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brsgor3u:3012: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti
GSP33brsgor3u:3017: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:3018: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye
GSP33brsgor3u:3021: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3027: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3042: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo
GSP33brsgor3u:3044: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam
GSP33brsgor3u:3045: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3048: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3057: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā
GSP33brsgor3u:3062: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3063: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3064: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3065: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3067: tena śravaṇādikameva kimiti na vipacyante, tatrāha-yāni ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3071: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko
GSP33brsgor3u:3082: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3083: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale 'pi mokṣe kaścidutkarṣādiviśeṣaḥ syādityata āha-evaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3088: muktiḥ saviśeṣā, phalatvādvidyāvadataḥ karmasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3090: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3093: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3103: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ, tatrāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3104: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3105: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3107: tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3108: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3113: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
